Job Description:  Manage in cassava planting operation from planting to harvesting (soil plough checking, harrowing, pesticide and herbicide spraying, fertilizer applying, harvesting, cassava stock…...) Manage the cassava stock, bride weight and make sure that cassava warehouse has no any insect  Manage harvesting and new planting planning with high seed quality  Make annual cassava growing planning for approval from the top management  Participate in looking for sub-contractor and planting quotation for cassava planting according to the plan  Compile the contract for cassava sub-contractor and improve from day to day  Prepare budget and request claim for sub-contractor and arrange all document related for claiming (Make sure that all data is check and correctly) Compile procedure for sub-contractor to clear and claim planting (Planting land size measurement, job order, germination rate, size and height of the row, deep of plough) Make cross check with sub-contractors for their all activities Research and develop to improve cassava yield and efficiency of planting operation  Improve the policies, organizations and systems in support of company's mission  Liaise and interact with managers of other departments Train and manage employee to improve their working quality  Participate in staff recruitment and make a draft job description of staff under supervise  Coordinate and manage the work of subcontractors; inspect and verify that the work being carried out by the subcontractors is according to specification and contract Manage and supervise to construct of all infrastructure in the farm  Take care and maintenance of all agriculture equipment and materials  Manage the day-to-day farm operation to ensure the operation runs smoothly  Follow up and Report farm activities to the management Identify problem happened in the farm and solve the problems  Carry out other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:  Good attitude and energy level Good communication Good in financial analyze  Good in budget planning Good in management skill Fluency English  Strategic thinking capability Personal Effectiveness Initiative and Leadership Adding value through people development Bachelor or mater degree in agriculture or related field Cassava working experiences are encourage to apply for the position Have minimum 5 years working experience in agriculture farm management Open mine and willing to change for farm management style & yield improvement Able to manage budget for farm activities Have a good communication with multiple cultures Able to use GPS for land size calculation Able to speak Khmer and English Able to work with local communities Good in written and speak in English (Speaking and reporting) Able to stay and work in the farm Initiative do a research for new agriculture technology for yield improvement Have a good problem identify and solving Be honesty and working hard

job title: Senior Unit Manager, Foreign Exchange Management - 01Post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, Foreign Exchange Management - 01Post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “ Senior Unit Manager, Foreign Exchange Management " position is responsible for setup daily exchange rate, prepare daily monitoring report FX transaction, Dial FX with partner and branches.Location : Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Responsible check & verify quotation of daily exchange prepare by Foreign Exchange team..Responsible check & verify daily exchange for Hattha Bank Plc follow market exchange at least two time per day..Down load transaction daily Foreign Exchange transaction all branches from system..Prepare daily and monthly report Foreign Exchange transaction to management..Prepare daily and monthly gain/loss Foreign Exchange transaction..Responsible manage net open position follow NBC and BOD limit..Responsible quote exchange rate with partner banks, MDI, MFI & Market Exchange for selected the best rate for Hattha Bank..Responsible for daily trading currencies with partners to make a profit for the Hattha Bank..Responsible verify request special rate from branches..Responsible check rate with banks, MDI, MFI & Market .Exchange & provide the best rate to branches..Responsible submit special rate request from branches to management approve..Responsible for buying and selling currencies of branches request special rate with partners immediately to make a profit.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor degree in banking/finance or business management, or related fields..At least 1-year experience in FX banking transaction.Prior other financial product management experience is preferred..Extensive knowledge in other financial products, analytical, quantitative, problem solving, communication (written and verbal), presentation, relationship management skills..Be proficient in English both speaking and writing..Be innovative, dynamic, and confident.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: គោលបំណងសំខាន់ៗនៃតួនាទីជា “មន្ត្រីផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន” គឺកំណត់អំពីភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្មរបស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងរៀបចំឯកសារបញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជន រួចតាមដាននិងប្រមូលឥណទានដែលយឺតយ៉ាវក្នុងការសងត្រឡប់។Location: រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ - ៣៩នាក់ | ខេត្តបន្ទាយមានជ័យ - ០៣នាក់ | ខេត្តបាត់ដំបង - ០៦នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ចាម - ០៨នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ឆ្នាំង - ០៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដកោះកុង - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ធំ - ១០នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពត់ - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដកណ្ដាល - ៣៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដក្រចេះ - ០៣នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ស្ពឺ - ០២នាក់ | ខេត្ដព្រះសីហនុ - ០៧នាក់ | ខេត្ដព្រៃវែង - ០៩នាក់ | ខេត្ដតាកែវ - ០៨នាក់ | ខេត្ដត្បូងឃ្មុំ - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដពោធិ៍សាត់ - ០៦នាក់ | ខេត្ដសៀមរាប - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដស្វាយរៀង - ០៥នាក់ | ខេត្ដព្រះវិហារ - ០២នាក់Duties and Responsibilities.ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពី ផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា ដើម្បីពង្រីកទីផ្សារ និងទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនសក្តានុពល។.ធ្វើការប្រឹក្សា និងពិគ្រោះយោបល់ ជាមួយអតិថិជន ដើម្បីជាដំណោះស្រាយផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជូនអតិថិជន។.រៀបចំឯកសារឥណទាន ប្រមូលព័ត៌មាន វាយតម្លៃឥណទានជូនអតិថិជន តាមដាននិងដោះស្រាយនៃការសងត្រលប់របស់អតិថិជន។.រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពដើម្បីឲ្យសម្រេចតាមផែនការសូចនករទាំងប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ខ្លួន។.អនុវត្តតាមលំហូរការងារឥណទាន និងតាមសេចក្តីសម្រេចដែលមានសុពលភាពឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។.បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រឹក្សាឥណទាន និងនាយកសាខា។
Job Requirement: .ជាប់បាក់ឌុប ឬកំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើគ្រប់ជំនាញ។.មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ ឬការផ្សព្វផ្សាយកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។.មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឹងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។.មានប្រវត្តិរស់នៅក្នុងសហគមន៍ល្អ ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួននិងអាចបើកបរបាន។.ផ្នែកគណិតវិទ្យាអាចវិភាគ គណនា និងយល់ដឹងពីផ្នែកទីផ្សារ។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: • Plan, develop and implement strategic digital marketing plan to reach new market segments and enlarge market shares (if applicable).• Develop the budget plans to carry out the digital marketing campaigns (if applicable).• Providing innovative online marketing concepts to glorify company brands, products, and services.• Planning digital marketing campaigns, including web, email, social media, Facebook and display advertising.• Lead on social media pages (Tik Tuk, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube and etc.)• Demonstrated Facebook and Tik Tuk experience, such as Page management, LIVE streaming, and Messenger.• Create a solid social media plan to increase followers, brand awareness, and engagement.• Implement online marketing promotions and strategies to increase monthly sales targets.• Research on customer and product trends, and identify new opportunities to drive digital growth.• Establish and maintain relationships with influencers, outside media partners and key strategic partners to expand the network.• Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns• Other tasks as assigned by superior.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and Marketing.• At least 3 years experiences working as Senior Digital Marketing in Food & Beverage Industry.• Having Solid knowledge of web analytics tools like Google Analytics• Very good communication skill.• Must be very good at English.• Excellent oral and written communication skills.• Strong organization and analytical skills.• Be able to travelling.• Good time management skills.• Be positive and result oriented.
Company Profile: COLOR CUP, which has been in business for almost 5 years, is one of the leading and biggest local outdoor pubs, founded by Cambodian shareholders with the goal of creating a recognizable local brand in the kingdom. It is currently led by young Cambodians who have committed to providing high-quality services, a fancy atmosphere, a wide selection of mouthwatering cuisine, fresh drinks, and affordable costs.

job title: Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Private Corporation - 01 post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Private Corporation - 01 post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Private Corporation” is responsible for building good relationship with business owner, SME, top management of companies to bring new business corporation opportunity for bank to support long term growth and comprehensive ecosystem.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Build good networking with high net worth people, business owner, SME, top management of companies to explore the business opportunity..Conduct market needs assessment for business development opportunity cover across areas of loan, liability products, fee-based income product, and enhance banking facilities..Prepare the business proposal to ensure both Hattha Bank and strategic partners get a fair benefit..Lead and manage with business partner for business agreement, business requirement development, process mapping, reconciliation process, end-to-end process to ensure the smoothness after business implementation..Lead and facilitate the preparation of Medium-Term Business Plan (MTBP) and yearly Operational Plan (OP) to support long term strategic direction..Deliver the strategic initiatives (SI) set by company..Facilitate the preparation of the marketing strategy, promotional campaign, marketing activities, message communication to market to ensure the mislead communication..Design and monitor the business performance and regular update to align with business partners..Building, improve staff capability by equip sale techniques, skills, understanding to deal with all types of customers..Perform other task as assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Master degree in banking/finance or business management, or related fields..At least 03 years’ experience in corporate banking, other financial or financial services industry..Prior other financial product management experience is preferred..Extensive knowledge in other financial products, analytical, quantitative, problem solving, communication (written and .verbal), presentation, relationship management skills..Be proficient in English both speaking and writing..Be innovative, dynamic, and confident.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description:
•	Data collect from vendor and company (Registered with our company).

Job Description:
* Leading Department
* Block spaces with Airlines,Shipping Lines and Consolidators. 
* Negotiate with Airlines,Shipping Lines and Consolidators to get space and competitive rate.
* Co-ordinate & Build good relationship with above service providers.
* Issue HAWB, HBL, Billing Invoice….etc by our own global system

* Report to MD for cost reduction. 
* Report to MD for weekly forecast.
* Submit to MD for Monthly Report.
* Others assigned by MD
Job Requirement:
* Honestly & Friendly
* Punctual
* Self Motivate
* Good communication
* Hard worker
* Patient
* Fluent and good skill in writing and reading in English 
* Computer skill for MS Excel, Word, Power Point
* Available for standby in office if have some case urgent.

* Strong Leadership
* Right judgement
* Strong relationship with Airline and shipping line.

Job Description: •	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានបរិមាណស្តុកដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងមុនធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តបញ្ជាទិញ។•	រៀបចំផែនការបញ្ជាទិញទំនិញ ឬបរិក្ខាឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា ដើម្បីអាចឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់។•	ពិនិត្យតម្លៃ និងគុណភាព ឲ្យស្របតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់មុននឹងសម្រេចចិត្តបញ្ជាទិញ។•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសារបញ្ជាទិញ និងតម្លៃលើវិក័យប័ត្រ ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងច្បាស់លាស់។•	តាមដានការបញ្ជាទិញជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ ដោយរាប់បញ្ចូលទាំងថ្ងៃខែចូលទំនិញ។•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យបរិមាណ និងតម្លៃក្នុងប័ណ្ណបញ្ជាទិញជាមួយនឹងប័ណ្ណបញ្ជាលក់ ដោយត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយនឹងវិក័យប័ត្រ។•	ដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដូចជា ដឹកទំនិញខ្វះ ខុសតម្លៃ ខូចគុណភាព និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័។•	រៀបចំផែនការការបញ្ជាទិញជាកញ្ចប់។•	ឆែក និងសិក្សាតម្លៃលើទីផ្សារតាមរយៈអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ និងតាមរយៈបណ្តាញសង្គមផ្សេងៗ។•	សិក្សាតារាងតម្លៃ និងប្រៀបធៀបតម្លៃយ៉ាងតិចចាប់ពីពីរឡើងទៅ(តម្លៃចាប់ពី៥០ដុល្លារក្នុងមួយឯកតា)។•	បង្កើត និងរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអ្នកលក់ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់។•	ចរចាតម្លៃជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់មុននឹងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ។•	វិភាគ និងកត់ចំណាំនូវអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលល្អសម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។•	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលត្រូវបានចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក។

Job Description: The main purpose of the "Supervisor, Core Banking System" is created to test, respond and manage all the requests from all department in Head office and Hattha office relate to system functions, system issues and user issue to ensure system functions properly and smoothly base on business product requirement and align with developed guideline for IT Service Management Unit. All business requirements and issues relate to system are control by Application Administration Unit to follow SLA then feedback to owner request about progress status and result.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities•Working/Following direct supervisor advise to achieve with meet of timeline.•Lead and manage activity plan for Application Administration unit, and follow-up.•Facilitate and feedback to department users on system functionalities.•Develop core banking application functionality, Flexcube guideline, manage customization, issues raise to vendor.•Team work for resolving the issues raised by end user, explore new technologies to improve team.•Communicate with all vendors relate to technical issue, follow up and simulate the cases.•Administrate on FLEXCUBE core banking functionality product set up, enhancement and related webservices.•Be able to manage and customize a small change in core banking with Oracle Flexcube Workbench.•Manage and report Oracle MOS status and all related issues raise to vendors.•Ensure all request perform with no error in live.•Develop FLEXCUBE functionality set up guideline and Helpdesk Manual Operation (SLA) is followed.•Record and manage all BAU/project requests, SIT, UAT, change request and issue log for core banking set up.•Review, follow up pending tasks and consolidate weekly activity report of Team.•Manage supporting result of new modules, product set up testing, status and feedback to owner.•Provide functional support/consultation/solution to subordinators to improve their performance and effective works to establish results as scheduled.•Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor degree in computer science, business or finance and banking..At least 2-3 years experiences of management IT/CBS..Good understanding of finance, accounting, and business requirement collection process..Excellent understanding and practice of FLEXCUBE core banking functionalities or others..Be knowledge of Oracle PL/SQL and willingness to learn new systems..Fluency in spoken and written English..Ability to work under pressure, as part of a team, as well as independently..Strong communication and negotiating and engagement skills.

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Specialist, Data Science” position is utilize analytical, statistical, and programming skills to collect, analyze, and interpret large data sets. Build future insights through prediction models and forecasting, risk management, compliance, Customer segmentation, Recommendation engines, Customer experience, Fraud detection, Customer Data Management, etc. by using data science strategy.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data sources into the data warehouse..Carrying out preprocessing of structured and unstructured data..Data mining to identify the trends and patterns..Using accurate data set and variables for analysis, using predictive models for decision-making..Using machine learning tools to select features, create and optimize classifiers..Developing prediction systems and machine learning algorithms..Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy..Present information using data visualization techniques..Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges..Perform other tasks assigned by direct supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields..2 years working experience as a data analyst or in a related field..Knowledge of ETL tools such as Talend, Informatica, or Integrate.io..Knowledge of reporting & data visualization software like Tableau, Power BI, Oracle BI, or Qlik..Knowledge of programming languages like R, or Python, databases such as SQL Server, Oracle, and Postgres DB..Knowledge of distributed data/computing tools like Hadoop, Kafka, and Spark..Good applied statistical skills, knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators, etc..Good knowledge of machine learning methods like k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests..Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques like clustering, regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc..Good mathematical skills to help collect, measure, organize and analyze data

Job Description: To deliver superior customer service through accurate and timely processing and recording the banking transactions in teller line based on customer financial needs.Location•	Phnom Penh and Provincial Branches (20 Posts)Duties and Responsibilities•	Aim to satisfy the customers by adhering to the Bank’s service-level agreement in processing the transactions within teller line. Job Description:
** Location: Phnom Penh and Provincial Branches (100 Posts).

** Job Summary:
To process and analyze micro business loan application by conducting credit investigations, scoring, credit checking and other underwriting activities to ensure good lending and loan quality of the branch.

** Job Description
• Solicit both potentially existing and new clients in accordance with the guidelines stated in the micro business loan policies and procedures to ensure the secured loans.
• On-board new micro business loans to ensure delivery of disbursement target.
• Explain to clients the different types of loans and credit options that are available, as well as the terms of those services for further cross-selling.
• Collect all clients’ required documents for loan application to ensure their eligibility for having it approved.
• Conduct credit investigation to analyze applicants’ financial status, credit, property evaluations, repayment capacity to determine feasibility of granting loans.
• Gather valid applicants’ financial records by obtaining and compiling copies of clients’ credit histories, corporate financial statement and other financial information to prevent them from being conned.
• Conduct a site visit during loan assessment process to obtain in-depth information concerning to the purpose of customer’s loan application and ensure customer security for the loan is sufficient and acceptable.
• Make the regular site visits to existing customers in order to determine whether the loan should stay the same or be downgraded due to the actual condition of their loan collateral and/or financial situation as well as to develop relationship with customers for further cross-selling.
• Follow up delinquent client immediately and refer such case to the supervisor in order to proactively handle the branch loan portfolio.
• Process registration of title deeds at local authority and land office to acquire the legal evidence of client’s right to ownership of the property.
• Stay abreast of new types of loans and other financial services and products to better meet customer needs.
Job Requirement: • High School Diploma or bachelor’s degree in finance and banking, accounting or any relevant field.• Minimum one year of working experiences in banking and financial services industry with a strongtrack record in granting loans.• Basic knowledge of the bank branch operations, rules and regulations, laws, granting loans, andcredit risk management.• Ability to use and communicate in both Khmer and English.• Ability to use Microsoft Office and Bank’s software.• Good sales and customer services skills.• Good math skills and ability to spot numerical errors.• Good problem solving, negotiation and interpersonal skill.• Strong dedication to accuracy and efficiency.** Interested and qualified applicants should submit only your updated covering letter and CV stating the position you apply for with current photo (4x6) through our E-mail: recruitment@ababank.com or call via 098 630 108.- Note: For more vacancies please visit our website: www.ababank.com if the above job advertisement doesn’t meet your career goal.

Job Description:
- Maintain existing and build new corporate clients in accordance with the guidelines stated in the SME loan policies and procedures to ensure the secured loans. 
- Collect all clients’ required documents for loan application to verify their eligibility for the loan.
- Gather valid applicants’ financial records by obtaining and compiling copies of clients’ credit histories, corporate financial statement and other financial information in order to prevent from being conned.

- Make the regular site visits to existing customers to determine whether the loan should stay the same or be downgraded due to the actual condition of their loan collateral and/or financial situation as well as to develop relationship with customers for further cross-selling.
- Follow up delinquent client immediately and refer such case to the supervisor to proactively handle the branch loan portfolio.
- Process registration of title deeds at local authority and land office to acquire the legal evidence of client’s right to ownership of the property.
- Stay abreast of new types of loans and other financial services and products to better meet customer needs.

Job Description:
- Process/originate/prepare Credit Appraisal Report of Commercial loan applications (detailed loan proposal write up and detailed financial analysis) of those customers referred by branches or by Head Office.
- Review and work in coordination with branches for commercial loan applications prepared and submitted for approval by branches and present the loan application(s) to relevant approving party.
- Conduct site visit to all commercial loan clients (to their business premise and proffered collateral) to further understand and verify client’s business model and financial soundness and creditworthiness of clients.
- Analyze and interpret financial statements of the business in order to access the repayment capacity and financial soundness of the borrower.
- Analyze, check correctness and verify documents and other information provided by branches and clients in terms of client's creditworthiness, business viability, purpose of loan, financial reports, collateral conditions, and other aspects of credit evaluation.
- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide sound financial advises and tailored solution for commercial clients.
- Constantly get updated on guideline, praksas, circular and other policies with regard to commercial loan sector issued by regulator.
- Close mentoring, in coordination with branch, on the loan recommended and reviewed for timely repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remain within acceptable level.
- Good customer relationship management and constantly try to cement relationship with clients.
- Ensure all commercial loan applications reviewed/prepared/recommended are in line and fully compliance with all ABA policies & procedures and with audit recommendations.
- Coordinate with branches and credit monitoring units to monitor and follow up on all post-disbursement conditions and financial covenants to ensure all post-disbursement conditions and financial covenants are fully complied with.   
- Assist in loan contracts recreation and execution and loan disbursement for Commercial Loan clients originated from Head Office.
- Work collaboratively with other business sale units to cross sell other loan products and banking facilities where applicable.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Banking & Finance or Accounting or any equivalent degree.
- Possess strong credit evaluation/analysis skill with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Ability to analyze and interpret financial statements (audited and/or management reports) of the business in order to access repayment capability and financial soundness of clients.
- Minimum two years of working experience in Credit Department (preferably in Business Banking or Commercial Lending Dept) in Commercial Bank(s) or relevant field.
- High level of English proficiency in both writing and speaking skills. Proficiency in other languages like Mandarin and/or Japanese will be an added advantage.
- Strong credit evaluation/analysis skill with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Ability to embrace positive change and assimilate quickly into a demanding role/environment when required.
- Ability to work effectively and efficiently as a team (intra and inter department) as well as individually.

- Good analytical thinking skill with sound problem solving and great decision making.
- Ability to effectively work under pressure to deliver/complete assigned tasks with tight deadline (when required).
- Strong customer relationship management skill.
- Advanced computer literacy in Ms. Excel, Word, Power Point.
- Strong presentation skills.

job title: Farm Supervisor អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
position: Farm Supervisor អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
- Reporting to: Farm Manager 
- Location: Oral, Kompong Speu
- Salary Negotiate 

** Knowledge; Skill & Abilities:
- Good attitude and energy level
- Good communication
- Good in financial analyze 
- Good in budget planning
- Good in management skill
- Fluency English 
- Strategic thinking capability 
- Personal Effectiveness 
- Initiative and Leadership 
- Adding value through people development 

** Duties  & Responsibilities:
- Bachelor degree in agriculture or related field 
- Handle and manage cassava plantation at least 600 Hectares (in the block ………)
- Manage and make planting schedule with farm manager according to annual planting plan
- Prepare planting claim request with sub-contractor and submit to farm manager for approval 
- Oversee on plant status which under supervise from planting to harvesting
- Observe and take action on disease, insect, fertilizer, watering, weeding, spraying herbicide, pesticide and harvesting 
- Observe workers to detect inefficient and unsafe work procedures or to identify problem, initiating corrective action as necessary
- Prepare reports regarding farm condition, crop yields, diesel usage, machinery breakdown, or labor problem.
- Estimate labor requirements for jobs, and plan work schedules accordingly;
- Direct or assist with the adjustment and repair of farm equipment and machinery
- Assist in drive and operate farm machinery such as trucks, tractors, or self –propelled harvester in order to transport workers and supplies, or to cultivate and harvest fields
- Report to farm Manager of the cassava plantation regarding the farm progressing report
- Other duties assign by the farm Manager of the cassava plantation.
Job Requirement:
** Qualifications:
Exposure:
- Bachelor or diploma degree in agriculture or related field
- Have minimum 2 years working experiences in cassava farming or related field  
- Have a good communication with multiple cultures
- Able to communication in Khmer and English
- Able to work with local communities
- Good in written and speak in English (Speaking and reporting)
- Able to stay and work in the farm
- Initiative do a research for new agriculture technology for yield improvement
- Be honesty and working hard
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
•	Daily inspection of the structural element before concreting and supervision of the concreting works by the appointed contractor during the structural casting stage so as to ensure that the structural integrity is kept.
•	Maintain proper filing system during the entire project so as to enable the whole project team to have an updated record on the work progress at site.
•	Ensure that any tests in accordance to the contractual specifications or statutory requirements are carried out at the site by the appointed contractor and thereafter report the outcome of the tests to the Project Manager.
•	Issue of site memo, to be vetted by the Project Manager, to contractor as and when defective works are identified or incorrect building materials are used or safety policies and procedures are not adhered to or good housekeeping not observed so as to ensure that immediate remedial actions are taken to safeguard the Employer’s interest.
•	Keep daily record of events that happened at work site which include weather reporting, state and progress of work, the manpower at site etc, using standard formats report forms as well as update on the report chart so that the Project Manager can monitor the timely completion of the project.
•	Report discrepancies in contract drawings or specifications as and when they are identified and any technical issues unresolved at work site to the Project Manager so that alternative plan of action could be provided.
•	Accompany any local authority personnel during their site inspection and record the outcome of their visits for the Consultants’ attention and action.
•	Attend site meetings with the Project Manager, Consultants and Contractors to update on the work progress and to resolve any technical issues, whenever required or designated by the Project Manager.
Job Requirement:
•         Proven experience as C&S Engineer / RTO or relevant role
•	  Working knowledge of data analysis and performance/operation metrics
•	  Working knowledge of IT/Business infrastructure and MS Office
•	  Organizational and leadership abilities
•	  Excellent interpersonal and public speaking skills
•	  Aptitude in problem-solving
•	  BSc or Diploma in Civil Engineering

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

•	attend events to find clients

•	Good in English Communication is a must and Chinese is Plus Advantage
•	Ability to handle the guest complaint in very good manner and professionally

job title: Assistant Maintenance and Stock Manager, 1 Position(Siem Reap)$200-$350
position: Assistant Maintenance and Stock Manager, 1 Position(Siem Reap)$200-$350
Job Description:
• Monitor the stock of spare parts, analyses the report and review the list spare part in stock.
• Key in the fuel and hydraulic, oil stock and analyses the report.
• Make sure control on the inventory to avoid any fault (Spare part Stock, Fuel Hydraulic, oil).
• Key in all the shift report for transfer area and land field.
• Follow up with truck shift and fuel consumption.
• Responsible for purchasing all materials and spare parts for repair work in the garage.
• Responsible for preparing all purchase request, materials and spare parts related to repair work with more relevant parts (orders).
• Responsible for managing tires such as (broken tires, new wheels and other wheel changes ...).
• Assist the Manager in setting the date to change the engine oil.
• Responsible for arranging and receiving vehicle repair requests from the transportation department and assisting in the repair work as well as keeping the repair documents in order.
• Responsible for administrative tasks such as staff attendance list, overtime list, leave / regular shift and other administrative documents required by the company.
• Assist the Manager in inspecting various occupational risks and safety at the garage location.
• Assist the Manager of the department in managing the inventory of the garage section.
• Supervise Stock keeper and Fuel Attendance.
• Other task may assign by Manager.
Job Requirement:
• At least a year-3rd of the university in Business and administration, Management, or a related area
• 2 or 3 years of experience in related work. 
• Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…). 
• Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within the deadline
• Good interpersonal communication and problem-solving skill
• Confident and self-motivated
• Able to write, read, and speak in English.
• Work independence and self-management. 
• Excellent teamwork and team-building skills
• Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development.
• Ability to work under pressure and be flexible.

Benefits
• The salary is competitive according to the candidates’ performance.
• Fuel, phone card allowance.
• Lunch provided.
• Work injury insurance and health care NSSF.
• Yearly appraisal work performance.
• Senoirity bonus.
• Others.

job title: ប្រធានចុងភៅសាខា
position: ប្រធានចុងភៅសាខា
Job Description: ពិពណ៌នាការងា៖1. ​បែងចែកការងារដល់ប្រធានក្រុមនីមួយៗពេលចូលមកដល់ និងតាមដាន / ពិនិត្យលើគុណភាពបន្ថែម។2. ធានានូវគុណភាព អនាម័យ វិន័យ រស់ជាតិ សោភណ្ឌភាព និងបរិមាណម្ហូប ប្រកបដោយការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ខ្ពស់។3. ត្រូវពិនិត្យមើលគុណភាពអីវ៉ាន់ដែលចូលមកពីផ្សារដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាគុណភាព បន្លែ ត្រីសាច់ និងគ្រឿងសមុទ្រ មានគុណភាពល្អ និងមិនមានបញ្ហា។4. ពិនិត្យមើលបុងទាំងអស់ដែលចូលមកពីផ្សារ ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាត្រូវនឹងចំនួនដែរបានដាក់បញ្ជាទិញទៅខាងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់។5. តាមដានរាល់អីវ៉ាន់ដែរចូលមកមិនគ្រប់ ឬខូចគុណភាព ត្រូវពិនិត្យជាមួយខាងអ្នកទិញ ដើម្បីឲ្យគេប្តូរអោយភ្លាមៗ។6. ស្រង់វត្តមានបុគ្គលិក និងពិនិត្យមើលអនាម័យរបស់បុគ្គលិក ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហាពេលម៉ោងបំពេញការងារ។7. ពិនិត្យមើលការទុកដាក់ និងការរៀបចំនូវដើមម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់បុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់ឡើងវិញ ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហានៅពេលម៉ោងលក់។8. ពិនិត្យមើលការចេញម្ហូបទាំងអស់នៅតាមទីតាំង(Station)នីមួយៗដើម្បីប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហាមុនពេលទៅដល់តុភ្ញៀវ។9. ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែរពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងការចេញម្ហូប ឬខាងសេវាកម្មកម៉្មង់ខុស ឬបញ្ហារសជាតិមុខម្ហូបនីមួយៗប្រសិនបើមានបញ្ហាត្រូវដូរជូនភ្ញៀវភ្លាមៗ។10. ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងដែរប៉ះពាល់ដល់ការលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ក៏ដូចជាប៉ះពាល់ទៅដល់ម៉ោងប្រតិបត្តិការការ។11. ពិនិត្យមើលការកម្ម៉ង់ស្តុក ក៏ដូចជាអីវ៉ាន់ប្រើប្រាស់រាល់ថ្ងៃដើម្បីដាក់ការបញ្ជាទិញទៅខាងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ (Supplier) ឲ្យគ្រប់ចំនួននៅអ្វីដែរចង់បាន។12. ពិនិត្យមើលការបញ្ជាទិញ ត្រី សាច់ បន្លែ គ្រឿងសមុទ្រទាំងអស់ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហា និងសល់ក្នុងស្តុកច្រើន។13. ពិនិត្យមើលការសម្អាតបរិវេណចង្រ្កានរបស់បុគ្គលិកដើម្បីកុំឲ្យមានបញ្ហានៅពេលចប់ម៉ោងប្រតិបត្តិការងារ។14. ពិនិត្យមើលការរៀបចំទូទៅទាំងអស់ក្នុងចង្ក្រានដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហាខ្វះខាតត្រង់ចំណុចណាមួយឡើយ។15. ពិនិត្យមើលប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពទាំងអស់ឡើងវិញមុនពេលចប់ម៉ោងដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែរកើតឡើងដោយប្រការណាមួយដែលមើលមិនឃើញ។
Job Requirement: លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ៖• ត្រូវមានអនាម័យខ្លួនស្អាត មិនមានក្លិនខ្លួន កាត់ក្រចក កាត់សក់ កោរពុកមាត់• មានសុខភាពល្អ (គ្មានជម្ងឺរាំរៃជាប់ខ្លួន)• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះគ្រុហ៊ុន• មិនប្រើប្រាស់គ្រឿងញៀន• មិនមានបញ្ហារភ្នែកម្ញូប ឬបញ្ហារភ្នែកដទៃផ្សេងទៀត• មិនជាប់ពាក់ព័ន្ធបទឧក្រិដ្ឋ ឬបទព្រហ្មទណ្ឌផ្សេងទៀត• អាចសសេរ និងអានភាសារខ្មែរបាន• អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ និងបទបែនតាមស្ថានភាពការងារ

It is currently led by young Cambodians who have committed to providing high-quality services, a fancy atmosphere, a wide selection of mouthwatering cuisine, fresh drinks, and affordable costs.

Job Description: - To learn the knowledge of the products and share it to the customers in the purpose of getting the interest and sales to achieve the company’s target and KPI set.- Communicate with the principles on the product knowledge, price, market information, sales & purchase plan and product recall.- Communicate with internal partners including sales admin and other departments to ensure smooth process of purchase, sales and after-sales-service.- To explore the healthcare market and source additional products to expand the product portfolio or suggest the adjustment to the current product portfolio to support the market trend.- Collect market information, analyze data, monitor market status for sales and marketing strategies of the team.- Increase brand awareness of our company and products.- Visit and maintain the relationship with both existing and new customers.- To implement sale strategic plan and perform sales activities.Attend training or workshops/seminars organized by the principles and our company.- In some cases, provide on-site supports with engineers for the installation and user training, and ensure successful closing the sales orders.- To provide brief daily activities, weekly plan, and report to the Business Manager- Manage customers and resolves customer complaints by investigating problems, developing solutions, preparing reports, and marking suggestions to management- To perform other related tasks assigned by the Business Manager and HoD.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree or associated degree in marketing, medicine, pharmacy, nurse, or related field- Fresh graduate or experienced is preferable- Selling, Negotiation & presentation skill- Good in English speaking, writing, and listening skill (Chinese is a plus)- Selling, Negotiation & presentation skill- Good in English speaking, writing and listening skill (Chinese is a plus)***Employee Benefits- Competitive salary - Full cover insurance - Allowance and Incentive - Public Holiday, AL and other leave fully complied to Cambodia labor law.- Seniority payment
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

-Dynamic Technologies

Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

job title: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបអឺរ៉ុប) (250 USD - 350 USD)
position: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបអឺរ៉ុប) (250 USD - 350 USD)
Job Description: ពិពណ៌នាការងា៖• ត្រូវមានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិគ្រប់គ្រាន់ និងយល់ដឹងអំពីម្ហូបអឺរ៉ុប• ត្រូវយល់ដឹងអំពីទឹកសុះឲ្យបានច្បាស់ ថាទឹកសុះអ្វីត្រូវប្រើជាមួយមុខម្ហូបអ្វី• ត្រូវមានការកំណត់យ៉ាងជាក់លាក់មួយអំពីរស់ជាតិទឹកសុះដែលមានការប្រើរាល់ថ្ងៃ• ត្រូវរៀបចំបន្លែ និងសាច់ ឲ្យត្រឹមត្រូវតាមការកំណត់របស់ប្រធានចុងភៅដែលបានសម្រេចរួចហើយ• ត្រូវយល់ដឹងពីបច្ចេកទេសនៃការដាក់គ្រឿង និងប្រើភ្លើងខ្លាំង ឬខ្សោយទៅតាមមុខម្ហូបនីមួយៗ• ត្រូវគោរពតាមការកំណត់រង្វាស់ចំនួនទឹកសុះឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវបំផុត• ចេះមើលលើពណ៌ កំហាប់ និងគុណភាពរបស់មុខម្ហូបនីមួយៗ• ត្រូវភ្លក់មុនចេញឲ្យភ្ញៀវ។
Job Requirement: លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ៖• ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកម្ហូវអឺរ៉ុប យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំ• មានសុខភាពល្អ (គ្មានជម្ងឺរាំរៃជាប់ខ្លួន)• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះគ្រុហ៊ុន• មិនប្រើប្រាស់គ្រឿងញៀន• មិនមានបញ្ហារភ្នែកម្ញូប ឬបញ្ហារភ្នែកដទៃផ្សេងទៀត• មិនជាប់ពាក់ព័ន្ធបទឧក្រិដ្ឋ ឬបទព្រហ្មទណ្ឌផ្សេងទៀត• អាចសសេរ និងអានភាសារខ្មែរបាន• អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ និងបទបែនតាមស្ថានភាពការងារ

Job Description: 1.Manage business and resources to achieve the direction and goal from management.2.Conduct market, competitor, and customer analysis to identify business opportunities.3.Prepare business plan, budget plan, reports to Business Director.4.Accountable for budget achievement and performance of the team by ensuring the team's competencies and ability in performing their roles well through training, coaching and other relevant supports. 5.Lead Sales, Marketing and Application team in Planning and implementing the business strategy. 6.Ensure the team’s awareness of corporate direction, mission, objectives, and activities.7.Provide sale forecast monthly, quarterly, annually and as needed to management and vendors.8.Attend trade meetings, relevant exhibition, and training 9.Cultivate effective business relationships with external partners and internal partners10.Ensure good customers’ satisfaction and compliance.11.Manage the inventory stock to minimize the expired products. 12.Manage expenses and price to ensure on profitability. 13.Develop job descriptions and responsibilities of sales, marketing and application team14.Perform other related tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement: *Bachelor degree in Marketing, Business, Finance, medicine, pharmacy, or equivalent. MBA is preferable.*Minimum 5 years in Business Management*Selling, Negotiation, Marketing and Management skill*Good computer skill, presentation and reporting skill*Good in English (+Chinese or Thai is preferrable)

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description: Executive Summary:Our client offers an executive a unique and exciting opportunity to lead and inspire in a rapidly growing and dynamic market with a very high patient unmet need. Our client is a company with a >25-year history, and its ongoing success is based on a strong focus on delivering meaningful value for its customers and society. It will need to evolve its offering and approach to continue to do so.Reporting to the divisional head, the Associate Director, is responsible for strategies, implement and achieve sales goals for the assigned businesses. The Associate Director would achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets with the aim of deeper market penetration and maintain outstanding customer relationships. The individual will also be responsible for creating and executing coherent product differentiation for our client’s medical devices products, play an important role in growing share, empower and add value to the divisional sales team to this fast paced and mission critical effort.You will be a member of our client’s transformation by delivering the most outstanding value beyond our current business base and making a meaningful difference to customers, patients, and society. You always put patients at the centre of our operations and ensure everything we do will sustainably benefit patients and bring value to the community.Job Description:Under limited supervision, general direction from the HoD and in accordance with all applicable government laws, regulations and client’s policies, procedures and guidelines, this position will:- Create, implement, and improvise commercial strategies and activities to achieve sales goals for the division.- Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual targets for the division for each product segment.- Manage a team of area managers, product manager, sales specialists, and field service engineers in the country.- Build and lead a high-performing sales and service team via hiring and strong retention, and in collaboration with the HR team and functional leaders.- Ensures team members/direct reports manage assigned customers well while meeting their deliverables and sales targets effectively.- Adequately respond to competitive threats.- Launch new products and develop appropriate pricing strategies for the division to increase penetration, gain share and drive profitability.- Responsible for communicating business related issues or opportunities to next management level (HoD).- Oversee order fulfillment by working closely with internal stakeholders such as RA, QA, CS, Logistics, Marketing and Order management team to remove key hurdles to drive on time delivery.- Maintaining outstanding relationship with customers and build a key opinion leader advisory and partnership with related society and academic societies.
Job Requirement: - You have proven results in executing sales and strong commercial focus on customer and end user experience with evidence in growing revenues in new market segments.- You have proven ability to think strategically and lead in a complex clinical environment.- You have proven experience understanding of the different healthcare ecosystems and the ability to translate from data to insight and recommendation for action.- You are a self-starter able to navigate multiple internal relationships and able to work in the absence of complete information and remain able to make timely, high-quality decisions.- You have efficient communication, interpersonal skills and influencing skill to work, collaborate and manage internal and external stakeholders in effective way.- You have experience with cross functional project management and excellent time and project management skills.Our client is an equal opportunity employer.
Company Profile:

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma
-Agrotech Vita
-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals
-Dynamic Argon
-Dynamic Technologies

Job Description:
I.  តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ
ដឹកនាំ និងចាត់ចែងផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់ និងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស និងគម្រោង អោយដំណើរការរលូន និងសម្រេចតាមផែនការ ។

II.  ការងារស្នូល ឬចម្បងៗ៖
-  រៀបចំផែនការអាជីវកម្មរយៈពេលខ្ចី មធ្យម និងវែង
-  រៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ និងផែនការទីផ្សារ សម្រាប់គម្រោង និងសម្របសម្រួលជាមួយអគ្គនាយករង និងអគ្គនាយិកា ដើម្បីសម្រេច និងអនុវត្ត
-  រៀបចំផែនការអភិវឌ្ឍនធនធានមនុស្ស ព្រមទាំងដឹកនាំ និងសម្រេចលើការជ្រើសរើសធនធានមនុស្ស ស្របតាមផែនការសកម្មភាពនានា
-  រៀបចំផែនការថវិការ និងគម្រោងចំណាយតាមផ្នែកប្រចាំខែ និងត្រីមាស ដើម្បីដាក់ជូនអគ្គនាយករងពិនិត្យ និងសម្រេច
-  សិក្សា និងពិនិត្យលើលទ្ធភាពពង្រឹងការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រប់ផ្នែកដោយផ្សារភ្ជាប់ទៅនឹងកម្មវិធីគ្រប់គ្រង់តាមផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យានានា
-  ចូលរួមសិក្សា និងពិនិត្យនៅលទ្ធភាពបង្កើត និងរៀបចំគម្រោងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍នានា
-  រៀបចំគោលការណ៍ និងលំហូរការងារតាមផ្នែក ដើម្បីគាំទ្រសម្រេចដល់គោលដៅលក់ និងពង្រឹងលើការងារគ្រប់គ្រងតាមផ្នែកប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធផលខ្ពស់
-  គ្រប់គ្រង់ និងជម្រុញការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ ឬអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹង
-  ដឹកនាំ និងជម្រុញការអនុវត្តផែនការផ្នែកទីផ្សារជាប្រចាំ និងការលក់ប្រចាំខែ
-  ដឹកនាំ តាមដាន និងពិនិត្យលើសមត្ថភាពធនធានមនុស្សផ្នែកលក់ ដោយធានាឲ្យបាននៅកម្រិតស្តង់ដាខ្ពស់ មានវិជ្ជាជីវៈជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាផ្នែកអចលនៈវត្ថុត្រឹមត្រូវ និងជំនាញលក់ច្បាស់លាស់
-  ពិនិត្យ តាមដាន និងសម្របសម្រួលលើភ្នាក់ងារលក់ ដោយធានាឲ្យបាននូវការចូលរួមលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃយ៉ាងសកម្ម និងមានផ្លែផ្កា ឈានដល់សម្រេចគោលដៅលក់ប្រចាំខែ
-  ពិនិត្យ និងសម្រេចលើការៀបចំ និងបង្កើតភ្នាក់ងារលក់ ក្រោមគោលការណ៍ដែលបានអនុម័តដោយអគ្គនាយក
-  ពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំបរិយាកាសកន្លែងការងារប្រកបដោយភាពជឿជាក់ សាមគ្គីភាព តម្លាភាព និងការចូលរួម រវាងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។

III.  ការងារបន្ទាប់បន្សំ៖
-  រៀបចំបូកសរុបលទ្ធផលការងារប្រចាំត្រីមាស ឆមាស និងឆ្នាំ ដើម្បីពិនិត្យ និងស្វែងរកយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រថ្មីៗ ជាមួយក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាល
-  ប្រជុំដឹកនាំការប្រជុំប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំរួម គ្រប់ផ្នែកដើម្បីស្វែងយល់បន្ថែម និងមានចំណាត់ការដោះស្រាយនានា
-  សម្របសម្រួលលើការបញ្ចុះតំលៃ និងលក្ខខណ្ឌបង់ប្រាក់របស់អតិថិជនជាមួយអគ្គនាយករង
-  ពិនិត្យ និងណែនាំ លើការឌីសាញ់ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស
-  ចូលរួមដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាអតិថិជន ច្បាប់អភិវឌ្ឍន៍គម្រោង ឬឯកសារផ្លូវច្បាប់នានា
-  ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារផ្សេងៗដល់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំប្រគល់ជូន។
Job Requirement:
-  ភេទប្រុស ឬស្រី
-  កម្រិតអប់រំបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងអាវីវកម្ម ឬផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់
-  ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងចំណេះដឹង លើការងារគ្រប់គ្រងអាជីវកម្មក្រុមហ៊ុន១០ឆ្នាំ
-  ធ្លាប់ធ្វើការផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងលើវិស័យអចនៈវត្ថុយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ និងយល់ដឹងច្បាស់អំពីវិស័យអចលនៈវត្ថុនៅកម្ពុជា
-  មានចំណេះដឹង និងធ្លាប់ធ្វើការលើផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់ ផ្នែកវិស័យអចនៈវត្ថុ
-  ជំនាញបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងណែនាំគ្រប់កម្រិត
-  ជំនាញចរចារ អាចដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា
-  ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងក្នុងសង្គម និងសម្របសម្រួលក្នុងក្រុម
-  មានអត្តចរិកមើលទៅលើការធ្វើផែនការងារ និងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ
-  មានអត្តចរិកពោពេញដោយភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ និងអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-  អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ និងកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms.Office Word & Excel, Internet and Email.

job title: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ  និងលេខាធិកាទូទៅ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ  និងលេខាធិកាទូទៅ
Job Description: 1. ចងក្រង និងរក្សាទុកឯកសារផ្សេងៗរបស់ផ្នែក។2. រៀបចំឯកសារព្រាងសំណើទិញសម្ភារពេលក្រុមការងារចុះទៅសិក្សាគម្រោងចំពោះសម្ភារដែលមិនមាននៅក្នុងស្តុកដើម្បីឱ្យអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ និងសម្របសម្រួលសម្ភារដែលទិញជាគម្រោងមកប្រើប្រាស់។3. គ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំាងមូល ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ និងមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។4. បើកសម្ភារឱ្យបុគ្គលិកប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។5. ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលបណ្ណស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភារស្តុកដែលបានអនុម័តពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកនីមួយៗ។ 6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ប្រភេទសម្ភារដែលស្នើសុំទៅ នឹងបណ្ណស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភារស្តុក រួចចុះហត្ថលេខាឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។7. ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពបរិមាណដកចេញ ប្រភេទសម្ភារ និងតម្លៃចូលទៅក្នុង Stock Movement Report រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។8. កត់ត្រាសម្ភារដែលប្រើប្រាស់នៅសល់ (Returned Stock) និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពបរិមាណចូល ប្រភេទសម្ភារ និងតម្លៃចូលទៅក្នុង Stock Movement Report ឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។9. តាមដានប្រភេទសម្ភារដែលឈប់ប្រើប្រាស់ ឬខូច ឬត្រូវលក់អេតចាយដោយមានការចុះហត្ថលេខាពីប្រធានផ្នែក ឬអ្នកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធឱ្យពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខា Asset Disposal សម្ភារដែលត្រូវលក់ចេញ និងត្រូវប្រគល់ឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការលក់ទៅខាងផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ (Finance)។ 10. បញ្ជាទិញសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ដើមខែនីមួយៗតាមចំនួនកំណត់ក្នុងស្តុកពិនិត្យតាមការប្រើប្រាស់ជាក់ស្តែងក្រោយពេលដែលបានរាប់ស្តុករួចរាល់។ ត្រូវរៀបចំឯកសារបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារ PR ភ្ជាប់នឹងរបាយការណ៍ចំនួនសម្ភារស្តុកនៅសល់ចុងគ្រារួចដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើអនុម័ត ដោយយោងទៅតាមតារាងបែងចែកភារកិច្ច និងសិទ្ធសម្រេច (TOCA)។ បញ្ជូនសំណើសុំទិញសម្ភារដែលបានអនុម័តរួចដាក់ជូនផ្នែកលទ្ធកម្ម (Approved Purchase Order, Requisition Form Approved )។11. តាមដានការបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារជាមួយផ្នែកលទ្ធកម្ម ដើម្បីទិញចូលក្នុងស្តុកឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា។12. ពិនិត្យគុណភាពសម្ភារ ដែលបានទិញចូលស្តុកឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់។ ពេលទទួលសម្ភារត្រូវ ធ្វើការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ប្រភេទសម្ភារ  បរិមាណទំនិញ តម្លៃសម្ភារទៅនឹងវិក្កយបត្រអ្នកលក់ និងសម្ភារជាក់ស្តែងដើម្បីធានាភាពត្រឹមត្រូវក្នុងការទទួលសម្ភារយកចូលស្តុក។13. ចេញបណ្ណទទួលទំនិញចូលស្តុក (Goods Received Note) បន្ទាប់ពីផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់រួចហើយចុះហត្ថលេខាលើបណ្ណឯកសារដែលភ្ជាប់ជាមួយរួមមាន (Purchase Order/ Delivery Note/Invoice or Quotation (Attach-Both Full Sign)។14. ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពបរិមាណទំនិញ ប្រភេទសម្ភារ និងតម្លៃចូលទៅក្នុង Stock Movement Report ឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ ដោយប្រុងប្រយ័ត្ន និងត្រូវកំណត់ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។15. ប្រកាសក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ស្ដីពីបិទការបើកសម្ភារនៅពេលរាប់ស្តុករៀងរាល់ចុងខែចំនួន០១ (មួយ) ថ្ងៃ។16. រាប់សម្ភារក្នុងស្តុកប្រចាំខែ (Monthly Stocktaking)។17. រៀបចំឯកសារស្នើសុំថវិកាបន្ទាប់បន្សំបង្គ្រប់សម្រាប់ផ្នែក (Petty Cash Replenishment)។18. រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ចលនាការចាយវាយសាច់ប្រាក់ និងការរាប់តួលេខទឹកប្រាក់រៀល និងប្រាក់ដុល្លារដែលនៅសល់ជាក់ស្ដែងក្រោយការប្រើប្រាស់ (Monthly Petty Cash Movement and Cash Count)។19. រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍បើកសម្ភារចេញពីស្តុកប្រចាំខែ ដើម្បីផ្ញើជូនថ្នាក់លើ និងផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ។20. ត្រូវរៀបចំឯកសាររាល់សម្ភារដែលរាប់ទៅឃើញបាត់ ឬលើសត្រូវមានការចុះអង្កេត និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បញ្ជាក់ពីមូលហេតុដែលត្រូវចុះហត្ថលេខាពីគ្រប់ផ្នែកដែលបានចូលរួម និងរក្សារទុកជាឯកសារកាលប្បវត្តិដោយយោងទៅលើគោលការណ៍ ក្នុងការអនុម័តលើការកែតម្រូវសនិ្នធិ។21. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ចំណូល ពីការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មដល់អតិថិជនខាងក្រៅ។22. គ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ទិញចូលប្រចាំខែ។23. ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍នៅតាមទីតាំងនីមួយៗ ដោយមានការចូលរួមសហការពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកនីមួយៗ។24. រៀបចំបញ្ជីទ្រព្យសកម្ម និងទ្រព្យអសកម្ម (Fixed and Non-fixed asset list)។25. គ្រប់គ្រងការស្នើសុំបើកម៉ូតូយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់បុគ្គលិក។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស គ្រប់គ្រង ព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៦០ឆ្នាំ- មានបទពិសោធន៍រៀបចំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងលើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាល យ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ- ប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email បានល្អ- ចេះភាសារអង់គ្លេស និយាយបាន សរសេរបាន- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ- ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា - ការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារ- ការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងពីដើមរហូតបញ្ចប់- ការតាមដាន និងជំរុញការងារ- មើលបញ្ហាជាបញ្ហា- ការបែងចែកការងារ- ជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា និងចាត់ចែង- ជំនាញនៅក្នុងការចរចារ និងវាយតម្លៃលើការងារទូទៅ - យល់ដឹងអំពីដំណើរការ នៃការងាររដ្ឋបាលទូទៅ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: Inspect vehicle engine and mechanical/electrical components to diagnose issues accurately- Inspect vehicle computer and electronic systems to repair, maintain and upgrade- Conduct routine maintenance work (replacing fluids, lubricating parts etc.) aiming to vehicle functionality and longevity- Schedule future maintenance sessions and advise motorists on good vehicle use- Distribute repair order to technician and assign job to the right technician’s competency- Make sure vehicle before and after service condition and have been perform correctly.- Control technicians to keep removable part, equipment and tools at the right place.- Make sure vehicle has been performing fully quality Check after repair.- Perform vehicle parts replacement correctly according to quotation confirmed.- Perform Self-check and function test and require drive test as per vehicle concerned- Note visible damage down on job order or vehicle inspection check list.- Analyse the Problem, Isolate the Problem, Verify the Repair with diagnosis team leader.- Perform vehicle test drive to ensure vehicle repairing complete with properly and correctly before delivery- Check external, internal, under boned and under hook of the car before delivery- Check Technical service report and singed to confirm service completion- Provide accurate estimates (cost, time, effort) for a repair or maintenance job- Maintain equipment and tools in good condition- Keep working place cleaned before and after work
Job Requirement: •	Basic automotive knowledge and experience in this field.•	Has experience as Service Technician position is an advantage.•	Good command in communicating in English,•	Must hold a valid Cambodia driving license.•	Have excellent communication skills, as well as an aptitude and great attitude to lean and develop.
Company Profile: HGB Group is a private local Cambodian investment and holding company specializing in automotive, F&B, retail and luxury goods by bringing internationally renowned brands to the country.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager 095666946 hr5@hgbgroup.com Phnom Penh No. 37-39 Preah Monireth Blvd. Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 095666946

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • To ensure that AIS meets the necessary legislative obligations• To act as advisor to AIS through the Human Resources, and directly to School Committee, Departments and individuals on staff matters• To facilitate the ongoing development of innovative policies and to ensure that staffs are complying all the school policies• To undertake an organizational role in coordinating and embedding a positive safety culture across the school and the staff • To provide regular reports and advice to AIS Committee• To enable the development and delivery of training to meet the needs of the school and other departments, including instructing department coordinators• To be a key point of contact to staff responsible for staffing • To put in place measures to audit, monitor and review staff documentation compliance and performances• To enable the investigation of accidents and compilation of accident data; to co-operate with staff responsible for insurance and other related matters• To assist in promoting solutions to issues throughout the school by active participation in committees• To advise the school on developments in legislation and best practice which may impact upon the betterment of the school and staff safety• To undertake such other reasonable duties as may be allocated by the President of Aii Language

job title: ប្រធានការិយាល័យធនធានមនុស្ស
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: ប្រធានការិយាល័យធនធានមនុស្ស
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រង រាល់កិច្ចការទាំងអស់នៃការិយាល័យធនធានមនុស្សប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពដូចជាសម្របសម្រួល និងត្រូតពិនិត្យលើការងារ៖
1) តម្លៃតបស្នងនិងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងរបស់បុគ្គលិក 
2) អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ធនធានមនុស្ស 
3) ផែនការធនធានមនុស្
4) គ្រប់គ្រងលទ្ធផលការងាបុគ្គលិក។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• ពិនិត្យ និងសម្របសម្រួលកិច្ចការរបស់ការិយាល័យធនធានមនុស្យ។

** តម្លៃតបស្នងនិងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេង  
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារបូកសរុបវត្តមាន  ការថែមម៉ោង និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ( 14ថ្ងៃ  ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងកម្មវិធីសប្បុរសធម៌ផ្សេងៗ)

** អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ធនធានមនុស្ស
• ពិភាក្សាផែនការតម្រូវការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រចាំឆ្នាំជាមួយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំនិងអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក(មាន៖មុខវិជ្ជា ឬជំនាញត្រូវបណ្តុះបណ្តាល,អ្នកបណ្តុះ  បណ្តាល,រយៈពេល,សម្ភារៈ ឬឧបករណ៍ត្រូវប្រើជាដើម) ។
• វាស់ស្ទង់សមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងអភិវឌ្ឍន៏។
• វាយតម្លៃវិភាគសមត្ថភាពសិក្ខាកាមមុននិងក្រោយការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។
• រៀបចំគម្រោងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងប៉ាន់ស្មានកញ្ចប់ថវិកា និង សុំយោប់អ្នកដឹកនាំកំពូលលើការសំរេច។
• រៀបចំកាលវិភាគ ឧបករណ៍ សំភារៈបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។ 
• រៀបចំវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
• ពិនិត្យរាល់សកម្មភាពរៀនបណ្តើរអនុវត្តបណ្តើរ ( control on the job training activities)
• រៀបចំមេរៀននិងប្លង់មេរៀន ជាមួយនាយកទីចាត់ ការិយាល័យនិង ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធដើម្បីអនុវត្តការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។  
• រកប្រធានបទអំពីការ អប់រំសង្គមផ្តោតលើសុខភាព សេដ្ឋកិច្ច សន្តិសុខ និងចងក្រងជាមេរៀនដើម្បីផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ឬបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។ 
• វាយតម្លៃបូកសរុប លទ្ធផលវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៏។ 
• កំណត់វិធីសាស្ត្របណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រកបដោយគុណភាពនិងប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
• សម្របសម្រួលរាល់កិច្ចបណ្តុះបណ្តាលក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន  សាខាសៀមរាបនិងក្រុមហ៊ុនរតនីវណ្ណហុង។
• ជួបប្រធានផ្នែកចូលរួមវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពការងារ (បុគ្គលិកហាត់ការជាង)។
• ទំនាក់ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយវិទ្យាស្ថានឬគ្រិៈស្ថានបណ្តុះបណ្តាលឬវាគ្មិនជំនាញដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាព(ប្រសិនបើចាំបាច់)។ 
• រក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាំង (hard and soft copy)ឲ្យមានមានរបៀបរៀបរយ   សុវត្ថិភាព។
• ចូលរួមបូកសរុបលទ្ធផលវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពការងារបុគ្គលិកនិងលទ្ធផលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រចាំខែនិងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
• វិភាគពីស្ថានភាពតម្រូវការបុគ្គលិកចង់ដឹងចង់យល់ក្នុងទីចាត់នីមួយៗ(ទំហំការងារ ខ្វះកម្លាំង ចំនួនបុគ្គលិក)។
• វាយតម្លៃការអនុវត្តរបស់បុគ្គលិកនូវប្រធានបទដែលបានរៀនរួច។
• ចងក្រងជាឯកសារទុកនូវប្រធានបទដែលបានរៀនហើយ (វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់)
• ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំកិច្ចប្រជុំ។ 
• ធ្វើកំណត់ហេតុអង្គប្រជុំ។
• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ។
• វាយតម្លៃនិងបូកសរុបលទ្ធផលការិយាល័យធនធានមនុស្ស។
• ផ្តល់អនុសាសន៍ពីការវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក និងអនុសាសន៏លើការពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាព។

** ផែនការធនធានមនុស្ស
• ពិនិត្យលើការរៀបចំផែនការតម្រូវការបុគ្គលិក ដំណើរការជ្រើសរើស រៀបចំការប្រឡង វិភាគ និងសំរេចលទ្ធផលបឋម។ 
• ជួយផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីគោលការណ៍ សេចក្តីណែនាំនិងសេចក្ដី សំរេច ដល់បុគ្គលិកហាត់ការ និងបុគ្គលិកដែលមានតម្រូវការបញ្ជាក់បន្ថែមការយល់ដឹង។
• ជួយធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពតួនាទីភារកិច្ច (Update JD). 
• ពិនិត្យបុគ្គលិកត្រូវបន្តកិច្ចសន្យាការងារ។

** គ្រប់គ្រងលទ្ធផលការងបុគ្គលិក។
• ពិនិត្យពីការរៀបចំឯកសារវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពការងារបុគ្គលិកឱ្យបាន ទាន់ពេលកំណត់ និងមានកិច្ចសហការយ៉ាងល្អជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
• ផ្តល់យោបល់ពីការវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាព លទ្ធភាពការងារ និងលទ្ធផលសំរេចបានរបស់បុគ្គលិកជាប្រចាំ។
• ពិនិត្យការបូកសរុបទិន្នន័យការវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក វិភាគផ្តល់យោបល់និងទទួលអនុសាសាន៏កែលម្អពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងឲ្យទាន់ពេលនិងត្រឹមត្រូវច្បាស់លាស់ជាប្រចាំ។
• ផ្តល់យោបល់និងពិនិត្យ លើការ បូកសរុបលទ្ធផលដូចជា ទិន្នន័យទំហំការងារ (ពិន្ទុ) កម្រៃជើងសារ (commission sell, Bonus ផ្នែក ជួសជុល ដាំ សំអាតសំបក ខាត់ និង 3D)មកពីជំនួយការប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន(កញ្ញា សឿនមករ៉ា)និងធានាភាពត្រឹមត្រូវដើម្បីដាក់ជូនទីចាត់ការគណនេយ្យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុប្រចាំខែ។
• ពិនិត្យការធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពទិន្នន័យ ព័ត៌មានបុគ្គលិក (កែសម្រួលភារកិច្ច តម្លើងតួនាទី ប្តូរ ផ្ទេរ និងកែសម្រួលប្រាក់ បៀវត្ស)ឲ្យស្របតាមរចនាសម្ព៍័ន្ធ។
• ពិនិត្យទិន្នន័យ ការរៀបចំបញ្ជីប្រាក់បៀវត្សក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ NAVប្រចាំខែ និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពតាមសេចក្តីសម្រេចប្រចាំខែឲ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ។
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមតម្រូវការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ។

Job Description: - Take lead to provide timely advice and guidance on the  response action plans for events and incidents based on  incident type and severity- Advanced analysis of the results of the monitoring  solutions, assess escalated output from Level 1 & 2  Analysts- Provide intermediate event analysis, incident detection,  and escalate as needed to Level 3 Analyst with  documented procedures- Ensures that all identified events are promptly validated  and thoroughly investigated- Provide oversight and guidance to Level 1 &2 Analysts to  monitor, detect, analyze, remediate, and report on  cybersecurity events and incidents- Oversee documentation owned by the SOC team  including but not limited to Standard Security Operating- Procedures (SOPs) and Operational Level Agreements  (OLAs) Relationship Management- Remain current on cyber security trends and intelligence  (open source and commercial) in order to guide the  security analysis & identification capabilities of the SOC
Job Requirement: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity,   Information Systems, Information Technology, Engineering- Minimum of 3 to 5 years of related work experience in   Internal and External Intelligence.- Any completion or certified of the following certifications   OSCP, CA, and SIEM- 3 years working within the information field, with emphasis   on security operations, incident management, intrusion   analysis- Experience with security device installation, configuration   and troubleshooting (e.g., SIEM (OSSEC and LogRhythm etc.)- Experience in designing and building security operations   centre.- Experience with security product, Firewall, antivirus, and   any other similar security solutions.- Experience working with OS: Windows Server, Linux (red   hat/CentOS), and VMware.
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: - Manage, develop, implement, and review industry-standard  IT assurance frameworks, policies, procedures and standards;  and build a tailored and dynamic multi-year assurance plan.- Ensure that all IT services are compliant with agreed   quality, performance and customer experience standards; or   have realistic plans in place to address areas requiring   remediation.- Support the consolidation and evolution of a continuous  improvement culture- Develop, implement and communicate the Bank information  cyber security policy, standards and guidelines ensuring   these remain fit-for-purpose and in line with Bank investment  appetite. Contribute to information security and help to  translate any investment decisions required in terms of risk  and compliance with legislation, regulation and relevant  standards.- Plan, implement and monitor reporting mechanisms for  governance, cyber security and risk management practices.- Review and audit the IT services provision. Ensure service  level agreements are in place and monitored. Proactively seek  to improve service delivery and sustainability targets and  ensure actions and addressed. Position the IT Assurance &- Cyber Security team as a change catalyst for operational  excellence, improved accountability, effectiveness and  efficiency.- Lead and contribute to Information Cyber Security training  and awareness initiatives to maximize staff awareness and  compliance.- Provide authoritative advice and guidance on security   control' requirements in collaboration with experts from   other area e.g. legal. Oversee the authorization, delegation   and monitoring of IT access rights and privileges across the   Bank.- Maintain subject matter knowledge, identify and monitor  environmental and IT assurance and information security   industry trends, current and emerging technologies and   issues, and related legislative, legal and statutory changes
Job Requirement: - Graduated bachelor's degree of Information Technology,   preferably in the field of Computer Science.- 5 years in an IT security governance and compliance   management experience.- Industry recognized training in security (e.g. ISACA, PCI-   DSS, COBIT, ISO 27K, ISACA, and Ec-council, INST, etc.)- 5+ years working within the information field, with emphasis   on security operations, assurance, governance and audit- Experienced with gap analysis of NBC-TRM guideline and PCI -   requirements- Strong knowledge of current and emerging cyber security   risks, and innovative risk management methods and solutions- Ability to collaboratively develop a risk strategy in   conjunction with stakeholders- Strong analytical thinking, written, and oral communication   and presentation skills
