job title: បុគ្គលិកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក ($255-$323)
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក ($255-$323)
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិកស្តុកកាត់កែ មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការធានាអោយបាននូវការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រឿងចេញ-ចូល ក្នុងស្តុក និងការកត់ត្រារាល់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងព័ត៌មានអោយបានច្បាស់លាស់ នៅក្នុងស្តុក និង ក្នុងប្រពន្ធ័ NAV និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្តុកអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ ងាយស្រួល និងដំណើរការអោយកាន់តែល្អ។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• កាន់ស្តុកគ្រឿងកាត់កែ គ្រប់ប្រភេទ 
- គ្រឿងទិញពីភ្ញៀវ (FGBI)
- គ្រឿងភ្ញៀវបដិសេធ (SB)
- គ្រឿងបដិសេធពីសាខាសៀមរាប (SBSR) 
- គ្រឿងជួសជុលរួច (R) 
- គ្រឿងដាំថ្មី (New) 
- គ្រឿងហុងកុងថ្មី (FG-HK) 
- និងប្រភេទកាំ (កាំសល់ពីកុម្ម៉ង់ និង កាំសល់ពីទូ)
• គ្រប់គ្រងវត្ថុធាតុដើមដែលនៅសល់ពីកាត់កែ (មាស ពេជ្រ ត្បូង និល ព័ក្ស…) ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• យកវត្ថុធាតុដើមដែលនៅសល់ពីកាត់កែ ទៅពិនិត្យគុណភាពដើម្បីផ្ទេរស្តុកចេញ
- (ពេជ្រ ត្បូង និល ព័ក្ស…) ទៅពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៅ ផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពពេជ្រ និង ត្បូង 
- (មាស) ទៅពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៅ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងសំណល់លោហៈធាតុ
• គ្រប់គ្រងលំហូរគ្រឿងក្នុងស្តុកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងច្បាស់លាស់
• ធ្វើការកត់ត្រា និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្តុកគ្រឿងប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ អោយបានទៀងទាត់ និងច្បាស់លាស់
• ធ្វើការកត់ត្រាចំពោះគ្រឿងចេញចូលក្នុងស្តុកនៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ NAV 
• ទទួល និងចុះហត្ថលេខាគ្រឿងចេញ-ចូលស្តុកពីគ្រប់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធមាន (ទីចាត់ការផលិតកម្ម និងទីចាត់ការហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ…)
• រៀបចំកូពីគ្រឿង និងរៀបចំគ្រឿង ឆែកលេខកូដគ្រឿងដើម្បីផ្ទេរស្តុកចេញទៅក្រុមស្តុកគ្រឿងមិនទាន់សម្រេច និងចូលទៅក្រុមត្រៀមចូលទួ
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសារផ្ទេរស្តុកចេញ-ចូលដើម្បីងាយស្រួលធ្វើរបាយការណ៍
• ផ្ទៀងលេខកូដគ្រឿងមុនពេលរាប់ស្តុក ប្រចាំខែ
• រាប់ស្តុកគ្រឿង និងឯកសារក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ NAV ជាមួយផ្នែកស្តុក នៅក្នុងទីចាត់ការហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងជាមួយបុគ្គលិកសវនកម្ម
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថៃ្ងជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង
• រៀបចំរូបភាពរបស់គ្រឿងនីមួយៗដែលមាននៅក្នុងស្តុក ផុសចូលក្នុងគ្រុបTelegram ប្រចាំដើមសប្តាហ៍ (ថ្ងៃច័ន្ទ) ជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង 
និង អ្នកលក់ពិនិត្យ

Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. PSE has six main programmes adapted to the needs of the children, those programmes include: food, health, protection, education and schooling, vocational training, and helping families. Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

• Knowledge in SAP system is preferable

• Advanced knowledge of Microsoft office (emphasis on Excel & Access)
• Strong initiative and ability to manage multiple tasks

Job Description: •	Establishes financial status by developing and implementing systems for collecting, analyzing, verifying, and reporting financial information, and managing accounting staff.•	Meets accounting financial objectives by forecasting requirements, scheduling expenditures, analyzing variances, and initiating corrective actions.•	Confirms financial status by monitoring revenue and expenses; coordinating the collection, consolidation, and evaluation of financial data; and preparing special reports.•	Maintains accounting controls by establishing a chart of accounts and defining accounting policies and procedures.•	Guides other departments by researching and interpreting accounting policy and applying observations and recommendations to operational issues.•	Maintains financial security by establishing internal controls.•	Avoids legal challenges by understanding current and proposed legislation, enforcing accounting regulations, and recommending new procedures.•	Protects organization’s value by keeping information confidential.•	Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities, reading professional publications, maintaining personal networks, and participating in professional organizations.•	Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.•	Manage and support tax & audit work with external & internal auditor as well as tax authority •	Accomplish ad-hoc works assigned by management
Job Requirement: •	Education and Experiences:- Bachelor or Master Degree in accounting or related field is desirable- Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in accounting/finance/tax•	Competency in English for communication and writing •	Flexible to work during weekend or holiday.
Company Profile:
AEON Cambodia Co., Ltd. is the 1st large general merchandise store in Cambodia that introduce the most modern life style merchandise to our customers. We welcome dynamic, purpose driven individuals who desire to make an impact and leave an impression in the best environment of success to join our team.

Job Description: •	Managing and control data of utility consumption all MV stores 15  and report to facility manager•	Control and  maintain facility maintenance service and schedule•	Daily inspection with check sheet and responsibility to building equipment and MEB systems to identify any issue with  report to Facility and MV management. •	Response on Viber communication chat  with reply for action. •	Develop and implement preventive maintenance procedure •	To be well maintain of maintenance tools and building materials•	Coordinate and Control security and cleaning services to be well organized and neat •	Responsibility and follow up emergency procedures during power supply failures.•	Responsibility all request and feedback the process of repairing from MV stores.•	Support technician team to resolve all QC defect work with issue deadlines and update every week to facility and MV management.•	Control and management building safety and report if find any risk•	Join  meeting with store management and report to facility manager.•	Verify MV stores request and make summarize service complete report and submit to facility manager.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s Degree in relevant fields•	At least 3 years of experience in a comparable position in another industry•	Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written•	Good in computer•	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude•	Good Health condition & team work•	Willing to learn new things•	Creative perception and honestly•	Able to work rotate weekend or holiday

Job Description: Major Duties: •	Make layout plan/drawing /3D proposal ( Architecture drawing / MEP drawing )•	Developing Schedule / Developing Budget and propose to G4•	Recruit contractor•	Arrange Tender document and submit to G4•	Negotiation price with contractor •	Receive and check quotation tender from contractor and discuss with G4•	Take action of any store problem immediately ( PIC )•	Site Monitoring & Reporting Daily/Weekly Progress to G4•	Control Quality and following standard •	Present Each project handle to Management as schedule•	Contact contractors/supplier and received quotation and discuss with G4 then send to each department request •	Sourcing equipment and construction material •	Feedback Concess Renovation design & scheduleOther Duties •	Receiving Oversea Equipment and arrange installation•	Updating receiving oversea equipment schedule to G4•	Submit Approval Document to Management and follow up progress•	Received and Submit Construction Handover to Head of Department/GM/ Store Manager and pass to Accountant •	Follow up supplier / contractor payment •	Participate in company events such stock take, tree planting and other Corporate Social Responsibility as assigned.•	To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required.
Job Requirement: •	 Bachelor’s Degree in architecture or interior design•	Working experiences at least 2 years in the construction field or international projects•	Good knowledge of Khmer and English in Speaking and Writing Ability to perform under pressure.•	Computer Literature, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Auto Cad, Sketch up…•	Knowledge of technical specification•	Good communication and interpersonal skill. •	Computer skill: Ms. Words/Excels/PPT, •	Other skills: Communication and interpersonal skill•	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude•	Good Health condition & teamwork•	Willing to learn new things•	Creative perception and honestly•	Able to work rotate weekend or holidayAuto Cad - Design Skill- Communication and interpersonal skill- Can work under pressure - Flexible on working time- Other assist by Mrg

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
•	Review and monitor company rules & regulations
•	Ensure the compliance is adhering to requirements and standard
•	Develop and enhance work efficiency in Office 365 and SharePoint
•	Ensure the company to have positive impact on local communities and the environments
•	Raise awareness of a company’s social responsibility commitments
•	Conduct research into real and best practice; initiate and coordinate outreach activities
•	Create partnerships with stakeholders
•	Expand company’s image and commitment due to the activities of CSR & SDGs
•	Form strategies or mechanisms to have more internal engagements in CSR activities
•	Make report and review all the company’s activities in order to identify problems and sustainable development issues to be addressed and initiate corrective action
•	Organize and monitor program/project related to CSR & SDGs
•	Conduct training, workshops, or seminars regarding to assigned topics and activities
•	Perform other duties as required
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree of Business, public relations, or other related fields
•	Preferable to have knowledge of Office 365 and SharePoint Online
•	Have knowledge of office management software like MS Office (MS Excel and MS Word, etc.) 
•	Good at English for communication
•	Have logical and analytical thinking skills
•	Strong presentation and communication skills
•	Be able to work independently and collaboratively with department heads
•	Be able to work with shift schedule (weekend and public holiday shift).

Job Description: + General responsibilities:- Deliver goods to customer or target area timely as per performance KPIs- Loading, transporting, and delivering items to clients or businesses in a safe, timely manner. - Reviewing orders before and after delivery to ensure that orders are complete, the charges are correct, and the customer is satisfied. - Assisting with loading and unloading items from vehicles. - Providing excellent customer service, answering questions, and handling complaints from clients. - Adhering to assigned routes and following time schedules. - Preparing reports and other documents relating to deliveries- Collect payment and make bank deposition- Follow the direction and guideline stated in DKSH Freight & Transportation SOPs- Ensuring orders are properly fulfilled, committed to work safety, and passionate about satisfying clients. - Report any issues if found wrong direction while performing tasks- Other's task assigns by manager+ Leadership responsibilities:- Drive self-learning and improvement in the area of Supply Chain Management and DKSH behaviors as part of continuous learning
Job Requirement: + Functional skills and knowledge:- Demonstrate working understanding of distribution center, distribution and transportation- Strong Physically and committed to work- Hard working and punctuality degree- Minimum one-year experience in similar role- Diploma or high school certificate- Driving license
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: + General responsibilities:- Deliver goods to customer or target area timely as per performance KPIs- Loading, transporting, and delivering items to clients or businesses in a safe, timely manner. - Reviewing orders before and after delivery to ensure that orders are complete, the charges are correct, and the customer is satisfied. - Assisting with loading and unloading items from vehicles. - Providing excellent customer service, answering questions, and handling complaints from clients. - Adhering to assigned routes and following time schedules. - Preparing reports and other documents relating to deliveries- Collect payment and make bank deposition- Follow the direction and guideline stated in DKSH Freight & Transportation SOPs- Ensuring orders are properly fulfilled, committed to work safety, and passionate about satisfying clients. - Report any issues if found wrong direction while performing tasks- Other's task assigns by manager+ Leadership responsibilities:- Drive self-learning and improvement in the area of Supply Chain Management and DKSH behaviors as part of continuous learning
Job Requirement: + Functional skills and knowledge:- Demonstrate working understanding of distribution center, distribution and transportation- Strong Physically and committed to work- Hard working and punctuality degree- Minimum one-year experience in similar role- Diploma or high school certificate- Driving license
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Tim Borin  087880665 jobs.kh@dksh.com Phnom Penh No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087880665

Job Description:
• Insure that the employees are getting the things that they need according to the company policies and market level.
• Makes sure that the employer has a good employee that works hard and producing good quality work.
• Responsible for workforce planning to make sure that all departments have enough people on each shift.
• Manage recruitment of qualified people no matter what department makes the request for new employee and does the induction and orientation of the new employee before they are sent to the department for training.
• Takes the lead in the personnel administration section keeping track of all the employees.
• In charge of salary scale, raising, compensation and benefits.
• In charge of time cards and making sure that each department stays within their limit of payroll hours.
• Do performance appraisal
• In charge of monitoring employee’s behavior and conflict resolution.
• Manage working environment, including security and safety.

Recruitment:
• Prepare the New staff Request for GM and MD approval.
• Conduct the announcement publication and collect CV for 1st selection and 1st interview, and prepare report to GM.
• Follow up 2nd & 3rd interview and Report.
• Prepare the New Employee Acceptance Form for final acceptance.
• Welcome, Introduction and orientation for new staffs,
• After Probation period, prepare working contract, with specific attention for Job and responsibilities description (this job description must be validate by Line Manager, General Manager, and Managing Director.
Work flow control:
• Create, develop and use internal tools and system for all staff work flow control such as:
• Time IN/Time Out; Time Off, Annual Leave, Sick Leave, Absence, Over Time…
• Control and send to top management all monthly report or special report.
• Responsible to keep all data update in the HR data base.
• Prepare and submit OT forecast to General Manager before 8th of the month for transmission to Managing Director before 10th of the month.
• Prepare OT request before 18th of the for General Manager, for transmission to Managing Director bifore 20th of the month.

Working space and organizational:
• Before a new employee arrival, HR Manager must also prepare and organize the work station.
• Organize, improve and implement all working area.

Performance Management:
• Prepare a performance management Plan, and create documents, forms and tool necessary for evaluation and appraisal.

KPI :
• Conduct and overview employee evaluation, monthly, per quarter and yearly.
• Probation period Evaluation must be submit to General Manager before 15th of the 3rd month.
• Prepare, organize and implement staff training, both internal (with department manager) and external (with school and organizations)
• Compensation and benefits administration,
• Company employee communication,
• Employee relations,
• Conflict Regulation,
• Employee safety, welfare, wellness and health.

Policy & Regulation development:
• Prepare and communicate to appropriate level, all documents for policy, regulation and process.
• In relation with Top Management, you developed or modified internals regulations, policies and process.

Relation between all departments:
• Prepare, organize and participate to weekly and monthly meeting, in order to facilitate and strengthen relation and communication between all departments.
• Prepare, disclose and classified all internal Official Notices.

Liaises with:
• Branch Managers
• Sales and Marketing Manager
• Service Manager
• Finance Manger

Work support:
• Participate to any other tasks assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 3-year of experience in HR-Admin Management
- Ability to make HR-Admin Policy and report
- Good Knowledge on Cambodia Labor Law and HR best pratice
- Excellent communication skills, Negotiation skills, interpersonal skill, and people skill
- High commitment and trustworthiness
- Excellent written and spoken English with the ability to produce well-written policies, procedures, and reports.
- Experience leading and developing a team of HR professionals.
- Experience creating and delivering soft skills training and working with teams to improve their performance.

Today, with over 170 employees, 9 Retail Stores, and 3 LPG Gas Station, Modern Gas is able to sale products through multiple channels, and is a leading Cooking Gas Appliances in Cambodia Market.

Job Description:
• Monitoring and analyzing market trends 
• Studying competitors' products and services 
• Exploring ways of improving existing products and services, and increasing profitability 
• Identifying target markets and developing strategies to communicate with them 
• Preparing and managing marketing plans and budgets 
• Managing the production of promotional material 
• Liaising with other internal departments such as sales and distribution 
• Producing reports to monitor results 
• Presenting findings and suggestions to company directors or other senior managers 
• Travelling to trade shows, conferences and sales meetings
• Making event or promotion

• A minimum of 3-4 years’ experience in a supervisory position in Marketing.
• Acknowledge able about kitchen appliance and specifications.
• Male or Female can apply
• Able to communicate in English
• Have strong organizational skills, leadership & ability to handle multiple tasks under deadlines and pressure.
• Have knowledge of Microsoft word & Excel and Microsoft Outlook.
• Good communication and team work spirit.

Job Description:
The Project Sales Executive is responsible for the implementation and coordination of all Modern Gas project sales within the assigned customer group. This includes servicing new accounts as well as existing accounts.
• Supervise all direct and indirect project sales
• Handling sales and follow up on key accounts 
• Leverage special events and marketing opportunities to sell products at high volumes
• PR
• Develop and execute a sale strategy targeting direct and indirect project customer groups (Apartments, Condo, Designer, constructors, etc…)
• Updating professionals and consultants with latest products and specs, trying to spec our products into their residential/commercial projects.
• Coordinate with other divisions / departments to expand product coverage and limit overlap.
• Occasionally fill in for existing sales representative servicing existing accounts
• Generate regular sale report
• Negotiate the terms of an agreement and close sales when needed
• Other duties as assigned. 
• Reporting to sale manager
Work support:
•Participate to any other tasks assigned by Management
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree or Completion of Training Courses in Sales and/ or Marketing.
• At least 1-3 years related experience.
• Product knowledge or industries experience
• Problem-solving and analytical skills to interpret sales performance and market trend information.
• Experience in developing marketing and sales strategies.
• Excellent oral and written communication skills, plus a good working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite is required.

Company Profile:
Home Access became a member of THAN’S in 2016, which was founded by Ms. Chea Kin in 1991. The development of the trading business focuses on the distribution of sanitary ware, kitchenware, covering, water solutions, lighting, and office furniture. With Cambodia’s remarkable market growth and development in recent years, the transformation of Home Access focuses on providing quality products & services, offering customers a total solution from project consultation to after-sales servicing. We maintain a strong dedication to inspiring our customers to build their Homes for their unique lifestyle.

Mission:

Our mission is to offer everyone the ability to create an environment that best suits their lifestyle.

Vision:

Our vision is to enrich stakeholder's lifestyles, offering inspirations and solutions through high-quality products and services, transforming houses into homes.

Core Values:

- BOLDNESS: The ability and confidence to be creative and take risks.
- RESPECT: Creating trust in the community and building strong relationships with customers and colleagues to achieve mutual goals
- OPTIMISTIC: Understanding different perspectives, to be open-minded and confident about the company’s future.
- STEWARDSHIP: Taking care of the company
Contact Info: Contact Information PHON SOCHEAT  093575167 p.socheat@myhomeaccess.com Phnom Penh THAN’S Building, # 46, Mao Tse Toung Blvd, Beung Trabek, Chamkar Morn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 093575167

Job Description:
Department: IT Support

Department Construction:
- Assisting IT supervisor to implement, follow up concerned IT project and coordinating with concerned other colleagues from other factories of group as well as dealing with
concerned department affairs.

Server Management:
- Being responsible for server data protection, monitoring, disaster recover, performance monitoring and improving as well as safety tactics implementation.
- Being responsible for collecting, analysis and integrating the demand of server, work out solution and test and deploy it accordingly.
- Being responsible for deal with the system problem immediately once problem happened, solve the problem on site and make the device resume running.
- Being responsible for creating backup data to guarantee data safety and monitoring the running status of server and intranet and address the abnormalities.

Network Construction:
- Being responsible for improving network system, adjusting equipment configuration and installing router/PBX/firewall, ect.
- Being responsible for installing, monitoring and maintaining company’s network and telephone and dealing with network malfunction timely, solve all concerned problem on
site and make it resume running.
- Executing other tasks assigned by Manger, etc
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree in IT with relevant Information Technology System Analysis, information Security, Data Network, and Computer Engineering.
- At least 1 year of experience with related field, and fresh graduate encourages to apply.
- Good organizational skills with the ability to work efficiently under pressure and to handle multiple tasks
- Basic computer skills on Microsoft Office, databases.
- High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills.
- High level of confidentiality & integrity.
- English knowledge compulsory.

Salary Negotiation Between: 450$-800$
Notice: Residence is provided

On February 13, 2017, Ventura Leatherware MFY (CD) Co.,Ltd was established in Cambodia. Now there are about 4300 employees and is expected to reach to 12000 employees in 2020.

Job Description: About the role:To drive the sales of the Bank’s products and services through the acquisition of new potential and corporates banking clients and the expansion of existing relationship to provide customers with an easy and friendly banking experience as well as to keep customers satisfied and maintain profitability of the Bank.Location:•	Head Office, Phnom Penh (03 Posts)Duties and Responsibilities:•	Maintain and grow a profitable book of business through product volume, establishing effective referral networks including internal relationships, existing customers, and local market activities to broadly promote the Banks’ products and services.•	Provide financial recommendations that are tailored to clients’ needs by developing an in-depth knowledge of the Bank’s products and services as well as analyzing the needs of clients and prospects to attract and retain them.•	Establish sales proposal and deliver presentation to customers.•	Work closely with product partners and other business units to identify opportunities and execute solutions.•	Eager participate in all activities to build customers base and enhance customers retention strategy.•	Keep a close eye on the Bank’s local competitors on what they are doing and how they are performing to make an effective plan to gain the market share.•	Maintain ongoing vigilance for early signs of potential loss.•	Prepare sales report and update market analysis on regular basis.•	Perform other tasks as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: Skills and Specifications:•	Bachelor’s degree in finance and banking, accounting, or any relevant field.•	Minimum two years of working experiences in banking and financial services industry a strong track record in financial product and service sales.•	Excellent knowledge in sales, marketing, customer service, client relationship management, communication, negotiation, problem solving, teamwork and interpersonal skill.•	Excellent knowledge in Banking, corporate banking and Asian business, regulations, laws, policies, and procedures pertaining to them, including but not limited to the AML and CFT law.•	Ability to use and communicate in Chinese, Japanese or Korean is preferred.•	Professionalism and presentation skills.•	Proficient Microsoft Office and Bank’s software.•	Ability to develop sales report and market analysis efficiently.•	Strong dedication to accuracy and efficiency.How to apply:Interested and qualified applicants should submit your updated CV, by stating the position applied for, with your current photo (4x6) through recruitment@ababank.com
Company Profile: ABA Bank is Cambodia's leading private financial institution (not state-owned enterprise) founded in 1996 as the Advanced Bank of Asia Limited.In over 25 years of development and growth, ABA has significantly strengthened its position in the market and broke into the Top 3 commercial banks of the country. Today, ABA offers the entire spectrum of services to customer segments covering SMEs, micro businesses, and individuals.With 81 branches, 450+ ATMs, 480+ self-banking machines across the country, and advanced online banking and mobile banking platforms ABA Bank reaches out to a large number of customers with an array of modern financial services.

Job Description: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is looking for a qualified nurse to work as a full-time staff at Rabies Prevention Center based in Phnom Penh. The limited contract is offered for a 3 months period from December 2022 to March 2023.* Main Responsibilities:- Ensuring the activities of the Rabies Prevention Center according to the standard operating procedures under the supervision of the medical supervisor of Phnom Penh Rabies Prevention Center.- Performing vaccination to clients- Providing basic wounds care related to animal bite- Assisting medical doctor in different activities of Rabies Prevention Center- Managing the cold chain for storage of vaccines and immunoglobulins- Managing animal specimens (specimen reception, shipment)- Ensuring the necessary opening of the center during certain public holidays for the benefit of patients- Respecting IPC internal rules
Job Requirement: - Cambodian nationality- Language skill required: English and/or French in addition to Khmer* Candidate Profile:- Experiences in performing vaccination- Willing to work in the prevention of rabies- Newly graduated are also encouraged to apply- High spirit of ethics responsibility- Proficiency in Khmer and English and/or French- Good teamwork- Good in communication, meticulous, autonomousThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.Deadline: December 27th, 2022.
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

improve safety, quality, and sanitation in the business

and community

content and water activity analysis and personal hygiene

the team learn and the business grow by experimenting with new ingredients, formulations, and processes

business runs safely and efficiently

meet the food safety standards

goes to the right location at the right time

job title: Internal Audit Officer ( Head Office in Khan Chbar Ampov )
position: Internal Audit Officer ( Head Office in Khan Chbar Ampov )
Job Description:
• Ensure the internal control procedure is in compliance with the company rule, guidelines and exchange best practices within all department.
• To carry out internal audit review with each required department.
• Provide immediate recommendation as the result of both the compliance, risk and operational audits
• Coordinate with all departments to implement the relevant internal control procedure.
• Coordinate with external audit and follow up audit recommendation and improvement actions.
• Prepare detailed reports on audit finding and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of correction process and give recommendation for changes.
• Collecting all necessary data for pre audit analysis.
• Ensure that all working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies
• Other task assigned by Director
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in finance or Accounting or ACCA.
• Have experience of external or internal audit preferably in multi business environment.
• Able to use MS office, system, good understanding of accounting principles.
• Good self-organization, strong interpersonal and communication skills, patience.
• Be able to travel
.
** Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

** Working place:
- Is based at Head office in Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh.

** Relationship:
- Works under supervision & report directly to Director.

** Salary and Benefit:
• Salary (Negotiable)
• Meal Allowance
• Phone Allowance
• 13th Month Salary.
• Annual Salary increment.
• Annual Staff Party.
• Annual Trip.
• Other rewards.
• Internal and External Training

Job Description: •	Supervise and manage the housekeeping (cleaning, security room owners) to work high effectively•	Responsible for leading the relevant departments to clean and organize the oil massage room, Khmer massage room, foot massage room, bathroom and other places, both branches (Angkor and Angkor 1) and make sure that it is clean and acceptable.•	Responsible for inspecting and improving the area around the shop, parking lot, flower garden, security and other places to be clean and acceptable.•	Responsible for inspecting the service quality of the laundry company and the services of the pesticide company.•	Shall direct and divide the work responsibilities according to its respective divisions in order to comply with the prepared SOP.•	The receptionist shall examine and request the materials used in each of his divisions to assume that there is sufficient use.•	Responsible for inspecting the lights, air conditioners and other appliances in all stores to make sure that there are no problems affecting the operation or to be replaced or repaired immediately if necessary.•	Manage and submit personnel plans for each division to make and review daily, weekly, monthly and annual reports.•	Responsible for resolving the problem of the staff in each division, if it cannot be resolved, it shall be sent to the relevant department immediately.•	Responsible for dividing the responsibilities of the staff according to their respective divisions according to their roles and divisions.•	Cooperate with the human resources and administration (coordinate staff with problems and find additional staff when needed by preparing original documents for HR and keeping copies).•	The actual work required is determined by its own supervisor.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor degree in General Management, or other related fields.•	At least 2 years’ experience in Housekeeping Management role, experience in hospitality industry is preferred•	Nice attitude with management skill•	Good interpersonal and communication skill•	Good command of problem-solving and staff management skill•	Good command of Microsoft Office, Internet and E-mail•	Good English communication.•	Must be able to display a high level of adaptability in any given situation•	Well organized, honest, and highly committed to a long-term career with the Restaurant•	Flexible working time based on business needed•	Teamwork, adaptability, initiative, analytical and ability to work fast and accurately under pressure.* Benefits: Competitive salary is going to provide basing on experience and knowledge.* How to Apply: - The interested candidates can submit your CV and Cover Letter to our office at: No. #16, St.310, Sangkat Beoung Kengkang1, Khan Beoung Kengkang, Phnom Penh or contact to: - Tel: 011 800 112 or Telegram: 011 800 112 or by E-mail address: hr@angkorspa.net - Website: www.angkorspa.net

Job Description:
•	Assists Managers and Partners during the Engagement acceptance and Engagement re-acceptance procedures
•	Assists Engagement Manager in preparing the draft Engagement Proposals
•	Provides input and works closely with Engagement manager in planning and scheduling work to be done on assigned Engagements
•	In coordination with Engagement Manager, initiates and organises the required Engagement team meetings and ensures that said meetings happen
•	Helps identify potential audit and assurance Clients or identifies any potential additional services from existing Clients
•	Initiates tailoring of audit procedures and obtains Partner and Manager participation as necessary
•	Supervises staff working under him/her, reviews work done by Associates including the related work papers and ensure that work done is consistent with work programme; writes up of Management Letters otherwise prepare management letter points for Manager’s consideration
•	Promptly notifies the Engagement Partner and/or Manager of any problems involving technical, administrative, or personnel matters which need action at a higher level and offers alternative solutions
•	Specifies segments of the audit programme to be carried out by other members of the audit team, ensuring that Associates are adequately briefed about their respective roles in the Engagement team
•	Supervises the work of the Associates and ensures that work done is consistent with the work programmes
•	Liaises with Client’s management to ensure the smooth flow of work and help ensure that good working relationship is maintained at all times
•	Promptly notifies Client’s management regarding any accounting, auditing and administrative issues identified by the engagement team, and alternative resolutions, to ensure that these issues are timely resolved
•	Performs procedures that are too complex to be delegated to staff and prepare the related work papers
•	Assists managers in the preparation of Engagement budgets for all Clients and monitor completion of work as against that budget
•	Assists managers in the timely billing and collection of fees
•	Conducts job evaluations and provide feedback to all Associates in a timely manner
•	When required, participates as training resource person
•	Sees to it that all members of the Engagement team observe proper protocol when working at Client’s offices and in all other dealings with Clients
•	Performs such other duties necessary to ensure that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards.
Job Requirement:
1.Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2.Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3.Experience: Minimum 3 years
4.Good comment in English



Application Requirements:
•	Name your file with quoting reference (Application – Senior audit associate)
•	The total document file size must not exceed 2MB.
•	Deadline is 23 December 2022, Priority for first application 
•	Application & CV to be sent to: hr.recruitment@kh.gt.com
Company Profile:
About Us

Grant Thornton Cambodia is an independent member within Grant Thornton International and a wholly foreign-owned company. Grant Thornton’s presence in Cambodia first started in 2004. A reorganisation in 2011 incorporated the expertise of Grant Thornton Malaysia to expand the service lines to meet the increasing demand for quality audit and advisory services of local business and international investors in Cambodia. 

Grant Thornton has offices in more than 140 counties and  56,000 staff.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for a high calibre talented professional to manage a Client portfolio and oversee the provision of high quality audit, accounting and tax compliance services.

As a member firm of one of the largest Professional services firms in the world, Grant Thornton Cambodia continuously requires high caliber talented personnel to join our growing team.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   023 966 520 hr.recruitment@kh.gt.com 20th Floor Canadia Tower | 315 Preah Ang Duong Street corner Monivong Blvd | Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh | Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia 023 966 520

Job Description:
• Performs audit work in Client’s office for audit areas assigned to him/her; follows audit techniques suggested by assistant managers/senior associate and considers work paper documentation required by assistant managers/senior associate in documenting the audit work done.
• Reports to assistant managers/senior associate any audit/accounting issues noted for a Client and discusses/proposes alternative solutions to the issue noted.
• Ensures that all overtime work is pre-approved by assistant managers/senior associate by completing an overtime form sheet
• Resolves all review notes of audit partner/manager/assistant manager/senior associate
• Documents all audit procedures performed before signing off on the audit programme
• Ensures that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards within time budget prepared by supervisor/senior
• Provides miscellaneous assistance to higher-level personnel in the preparation of Proposals or in various other projects
• Provides explanations and on-the-job training to assistants with less experience
• Performs clerical duties related to Engagements such as requisitioning supplies needed by Engagement team for fieldwork and organizing paper work files prior to review by higher-level personnel or before filing
• Conducts himself/herself professionally and liaises with Client’s middle management for smooth flow of audit work
• Maintains a good working relationship with the Client
Job Requirement:
1. Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2. Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3. Minimum 1 year of recent external audit service, and dealing in team work
4. Good working knowledge of Word, Excel and PowerPoint and Internet searching skill
5. Good command of English

position: ភ្នាក់ងារលក់សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រងទូទៅ​ ចំនួន៥០នាក់
Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងខ្ញុំត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ចំនួន៥០នាក់។ អស់លោក លោកស្រី និងកញ្ញាដែលមានការងារធ្វើហើយ  ក៏អាចរកប្រាក់ចំណូលបន្ថែមទៀតតាមរយៈធ្វើជាភ្នាក់ងាររបស់ កាមិនកូ ។

ភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:

•	Execute recruitment for internal and external opportunities including job advertising, sourcing, screening, interviewing.
•	Staffing and movement administration including, recruitment, transfer, promotion, upgrade, confirmation, contract renewal and resignation.
•	Ensure control, monitor and execution of all HR activities within the company, like Organizational Design, Recruitment & Selection, HR Development and Safety and Employee Wellbeing in line with all applicable regulations, applicable guidelines and strategies.
•	Ensure timely and correct data update in personnel files (Payroll list, OT, Leave, Staff Movement, Promotion, Rotation, etc.).

•	Assist in develop, update all job descriptions and Organization chart as needed;

Job Description:
•  Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
•  Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
•  Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
•  Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
•  Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
•  Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
•  Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
•  Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
•  Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
•  Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
•  Performed other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:
•  Master’s or Bachelor’s in Business Administration or related fields.
•  Three years experiences as a classroom teacher with additional experience in instructional leadership roles.
•  Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction. 
•  Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness and to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions.
•  Ability to implement policy and procedures and ability to interpret data. 
•  Strong organizational, communication, public relations and interpersonal skills. 
How to Apply
Competitive salary and please state your salary expectation! Interested candidates are invited to apply your CV and Cover letter to the following address and email : recruit@arizonschool.edu.kh  Tel:  015 678 109 or 081 900 813. Address: #173bis, Street 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo 1, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh. Website: www.arizonschool.edu.kh

We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
* Job brief:

The Web Developer is responsible for developing and/or designing websites and/or web applications.
Execute works of the system planning, system analysis & design, reporting, and other 
administration-
related. Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications. Maintain the deadline of the project to all tasks assigned.

* Duties and Responsibilities:

• Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development 
practices.
• Involve with the team to resolve technical issues.
• Preparing and designing temporary work requested from the project.
• Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
• Dealing with the problem coming up from the application development.
• Prepare and review the technical like technical specification document before sending it out.
• Maintains technical knowledge and understanding of the latest development methodologies and best practices.
• Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications.
• Coordinate the team when working across with other departments.
• Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site.
• Can use GIT or other similar tools.
• Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features.
• Working with Adobe XD or Figma or similar tools.
• Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.
• Coding with C#, ASP.NET, Javascript.
• Working with SQL queries.
• Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.
Job Requirement:
- Experience min 3 years in computer applications development.
- Knowledge of the System Analysis and Design.
- Able to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced, fluid work environment.
- The ability to adapt to changing priorities.
- Able to analyse and resolve problems at both a strategic and a functional level.
- Demonstrate and uphold all of Power Design’s core values, which include integrity,
accountability, teamwork, innovation, and growth.
- Proficient knowledge of Web Programming like JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
- Familiarity with Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API.
- Can work with back-end programming languages like C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, etc.
- In-depth understanding of web development.

web applications. Maintain the deadline of the project to all tasks assigned.

- Involve with the team to resolve technical issues.
- Preparing and designing temporary work requested from the project.
- Dealing with the problem coming up from the application development.
- Maintains technical knowledge and understanding of the latest development methodologies and best practices.
- Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web applications.
- Coordinate the team when working across with other departments.
- Can use GIT or other similar tools.
- Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features.
- Working with Adobe XD or Figma or similar tools.
- Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.

- Working with SQL queries.
- Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.

- Understanding the System Analysis and Design.
- Able to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced, fluid work environment.

accountability, teamwork, innovation, and growth.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description: Maintain relationship and perform interbank-business with partner FIs and customersAct as focal person in treasury department in selling all treasury products (FX, SWAP etc.) to partner FIs and customers.Assist Head of Treasury Department expand more treasury products with existing partners and new potential partners.Determine bank’s Foreign Exchange Rate base on collected market information.Prepare Foreign Exchange position of the bank and report to management.Survey and check daily Foreign Exchange rate in the market.Ensure that business plan and target of Treasury Dealing Unit are achieved.Guide and supervise the subordinates to effectively deliver satisfied results for the unit.Provide support to the branches on foreign exchange and other treasury-related transactions by providing information, guidance, and negotiation support, as well as solutions to meet customer’s needs.Assist head of treasury department in developing and updating policy and procedure in treasury department especially treasury products.Work closely with head of treasury department in preparing budget plan.Monitor and ensure the compliancy with internal rules, procedures and policies and other requirements and regulations of regulators.Perform other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: Bachelor degree in financial discipline or other related fields.Minimum of three-year experience in treasury, finance and management field.Sales skills and understanding of treasury function in the financial sector.Practical knowledge of operating risk and compliance policies and procedures.Ability to work effectively in a team environment with attention to detail and accuracy.Good organizational, time management, and strong communication skills (written and verbal).Integrity and approachability and working under pressure.Computer literacy; in particular, Microsoft Word, Excel and Power Point.English language proficiency is a plus.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description: Ensure the Bank’s policies and procedures are sufficient and in place in compliance with the law and regulations.Identify any inadequacy of policies, procedures, and guidelines within the Bank and recommend for their establishment.Work closely with relevant departments/branches in establishing policies, procedures, or guidelines, for the Bank’s operating environment and assess if additional external expertise is needed.Review and update the policies and procedures that reflects the changing regulatory environment.All updates, revisions and deletions must be recorded and easily accessible.Maintain policies, procedure, guideline requires that policy writers keep accurate files.Collect statistics information of the applicable Banking practices in Cambodia including common practices within the FTB or by various institutions.Convent a meeting from various departments/branch to discuss over found issues or challenges that hinder the establishment of the relevant policies and procedures.Evaluate the outcome whether the policies and procedures improves the operating aspect of the Bank.Ensure that sufficient trainings of policies and procedures are provided to all employee.Make sure employees understand the Bank’s rules and regulations.Prepare quarterly report for Risk Management and Compliance Committee on analyzes of policies, procedure and guideline.Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: Bachelor degree or MBA in Banking & Finance or related fields.At least five year of experience in developing policies and procedures with banking sector or MFIs.Knowledge of Cambodian Labor Law and labor market.Good organizational and time management skills.A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenges.Good negotiation and internal & external relationship building.Enjoy working with people and be patient, tactful, and approachable.Proficiency in English and computer skills.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Description: •	Fill and keep records of administrative forms in accordance with the company rules•	Establish and implement effective material control process, methods and procedures•	Manage the yard stocks and checking on addition materials•	Enforce that issuance and receiving procedures•	Inspect the physical condition of the yard, workers camp and equipment to ensure good working order and standards are maintained.•	Enforce all Security rules, company Safety Standards, and local policies/procedures to provide a safe working and staying environment.•	Must recognize unsafe conditions and behaviors and make corrections to prevent injuries and property loss.•	Other tasks as assigned by supervisorBENEFITS:•	Competitive salary•	Transport allowance•	Mobile allowance•	NSSF / Insurance•	Annual leave / Sick leave / Maternity leave•	Annual Performance appraisal•	Annual party•	Public holiday•	Employee coaching and training•	Career development•	Good working environment
Job Requirement: ›	A recognized bachelor’s degree in Administrative Management / Business administration or equivalent ›	A minimum of 1-year experience in the role›	Good command of English communication both spoken and written›	Proficient in MS Office applications›	Experience in Design and Build Company is an advantage
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

Job Description: •	To controls on physical cash management along with BMs and Senior Teller to ensure that cash at branches and ATM are properly controlled and monitored to avoid frauds and errors, while also work with the finance department on the ATM reconciliation and investigations if irregularity arrived.•	To perform day-end cash count operation with tellers to ensure that segregation of duties is in place.•	To ensure that the transactions performed by Tellers are properly verified and monitored to be aligned with the matrix, guidelines and procedures in place by performing necessary verifications on the transactions documents.•	To be one of the key custodians of keys to vaults and ATMs and other important assets such as loan collaterals, etc.,•	To manage the filing and archiving process of the branch to ensure that those important documents are properly stored and can be retrieved when needed.•	To control branch stock level such as stationary, forms, etc., and manage branch utility and security to ensure that branch operation is not disrupted.•	Perform other duties as assigned by Supervisor/Manager
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking or related field.•	Minimum of one years’ experience related to the said position.•	Good organizational and time management skills.•	Knowledge of, or the ability to quickly learn how to use standard office equipment, such as fax machines, modern phone systems, and copy machines.•	A strong desire to work in a team oriented.•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency.

Job Description:
This role is responsible for servicing the clients who come to the branch counter. The incumbent will build a thorough understanding of each client financial requirements and will focus on providing best services to retain and build deeper relationships with clients.

Main Duties

•	Process banking transaction for the customers following FTB service standards
•	Act as a key advocate to existing and potential customers
•	Proactively determine customer’s need to actively sell the bank’s full range of product and services
•	Keep update on product knowledge and policies
•	Ensure transactional processing is efficient and accurate 
•	Assist others where needed
Job Requirement:
Skills/ Experiences

•	Bachelor Degree in Banking or related field
•	One year experience in customer service, cashier/teller with banking/MFIs 
•	Strong customer service and sales-oriented personality
•	Good organizational and time management skills
•	A strong desire to work in a team 
•	English language proficiency, Chinese language is a plus
•	Computer literacy in Microsoft Office Word & Excel
How to Apply:
Interested applicants, please send by email attached with a cover letter and your most updated CV (with current photo) to: hr@ftbbank.com or submit the hard copy at Our Head Office, Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd(169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7Makara Phnom Penh. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Please visit our website: http://www.ftbbank.com/vacant-and-career for more available vacancy

job title: ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ
position: ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ
Job Description: ថែទាំ និងរក្សានូវសន្តិសុខ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងសុវត្ថិភាព ជូនអតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ ដើម្បីផ្តល់នូវជំនឿទុកចិត្តជូនអតិថិជន ក៏ដូចសាធារណៈជនរៀបចំសម្រួលចំណតចេញ-ចូល ជូនអតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ របស់ធនាគារ ឲ្យមានរបៀបរាបរយ តាមលក្ខណៈបច្ចេកទេសសម្រួលចំណតចេញ-ចូល និងធ្វើចរាចរណ៍ ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា ធានាបាននូវភាពមិនកកស្ទះចរាចរណ៍ នៅមុខការិយាល័យ
Job Requirement: យ៉ាងតិចមានសញ្ញាបត្របឋមភូមិ (សញ្ញាបត្រថ្នាក់ទី ៩​ (Bac I))។ជានីតិជន ដែលមានសញ្ជាតិជាខ្មែរ និងចេះអាន សរសេរ ភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ។ ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត។មានបទពិសោធន៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងកិច្ចការសន្តិសុខ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់សាធារណៈ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព។
